feat-absolute_mastery.name: Absolute Mastery
feat-absolute_mastery.subject: Personal
feat-absolute_mastery.description: For each model that would cause a Melee Assist Penalty on this model (even if it is ignored by the Indomitable trait), this model gains +1 Melee Pool and +1 Melee Weapon Strength until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-accelerate_venom.name: Accelerate Venom
feat-accelerate_venom.subject: Target
feat-accelerate_venom.description: Target Enemy model removes its highest value Poison Marker and suffers a number of Wounds equal to the removed Poison Marker's value.

feat-acquisition.name: Acquisition
feat-acquisition.subject: Target
feat-acquisition.description: This model may use any Special Attacks, Special Defences, Personal Ki Feats and the Melee Weapon, including Melee Weapon Strength Modifier, of Target Enemy model as if they were printed on its own card until the end of the current action. Any feats used cost 0 Ki.

feat-acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
feat-acrobatics.subject: Personal
feat-acrobatics.description: This model gains Agile, Defensive, and Dodge (+1) until the end of this activation.

feat-admirable.name: Admirable
feat-admirable.subject: Aura
feat-admirable.description: Friendly Juhin, Kaizoku, and Kancho models in the Aura gain Spirit (1).

feat-agility.name: Agility
feat-agility.subject: Personal
feat-agility.description: After making a Scenario Action, this model gains an Activation Counter.

feat-alacrity.name: Alacrity
feat-alacrity.subject: Personal
feat-alacrity.description:
This model gains an additional Activation Counter.
An Enemy model may cancel this Ki Feat by spending 1 Ki Token, this model gains that Ki Token, and the Ki Feat has no other effect but is still considered to have been used this turn.

feat-alert.name: Alert
feat-alert.subject: Target
feat-alert.description: Target model gains Aware and Ranged Defence (1) until the End Phase.

feat-all-in.name: All-In
feat-all-in.subject: Personal
feat-all-in.description:
Before a Damage Roll on this model, this model's Controller may flip a coin and call heads or tails.
If they call successfully, this model instead takes no damage. Otherwise, this model takes normal damage.
This feat may only be used once per Damage Roll.

feat-allure.name: Allure
feat-allure.subject: Aura
feat-allure.description: Enemy models in the Aura that allocate dice to Attack against this model in a Melee Exchange gain 1 Control Marker after the activation is complete unless the Attack Kills or removes this model from play.

feat-ancestral_armour.name: Ancestral Armour
feat-ancestral_armour.subject: Personal
feat-ancestral_armour.description: The next Enemy Damage Roll on this model is ignored if the individual dice values of the Damage Roll are the same number.

feat-ancestral_guidance.name: Ancestral Guidance
feat-ancestral_guidance.subject: Aura
feat-ancestral_guidance.description:
Choose one of the following:
• Takashi Hida: Friendly models in the Aura gain Indomitable (3).
• Takashi Akira: Friendly models in the Aura gain Last Stand.
• Takashi Hiroshi: Friendly Samurai models in the Aura gain Melee Boost (2).
• Takashi Sakura: Friendly Ashigaru models in the Aura gain Adept [Melee](2).

feat-ape.name: Ape
feat-ape.subject: Pulse
feat-ape.description:
When another Friendly Monk model in the pulse ends its activation you may become the Active Player again and begin this model's activation.
If you do, this model must declare the same action as that Monk and gains a Non-Exceptional, Special Attack or Defence from that Monk until the action is complete.
If the cost of the Special is 0 it becomes 1.

feat-apparition.name: Apparition
feat-apparition.subject: Personal
feat-apparition.description:
Place this model within 2" of its current location.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-asp_strike.name: Asp Strike
feat-asp_strike.subject: Personal
feat-asp_strike.description: This model gains Lightning Reflexes until the current action is resolved.

feat-athleticism.name: Athleticism
feat-athleticism.subject: Personal
feat-athleticism.description: This model gains Jump Up and Dodge (1) until the current activation is resolved.

feat-aura_of_serenity.name: Aura of Serenity
feat-aura_of_serenity.subject: Aura
feat-aura_of_serenity.description: All non-Soulless models in the Aura or in BtB with a model in the Aura lose Aggressive, may not place dice in Attack, use Special Defences during Melee Exchanges, Target Enemy models with Ki Feats or move through the Aura with a Charge or Run Action.

feat-awe.name: Awe
feat-awe.subject: Pulse
feat-awe.description: Enemy models in the Pulse gain a Frightened Marker.

feat-balance.name: Balance
feat-balance.subject: Personal
feat-balance.description: This model gains immune [Prone] until the current activation is resolved.

feat-barb.name: Barb
feat-barb.subject: Target
feat-barb.description: Target model cannot move except directly toward this model.

feat-barge.name: Barge
feat-barge.subject: Personal
feat-barge.description: After a Melee action declared by this model is resolved, move Enemy models in BtB directly away from this model until they leave this model's ZoC and then move this model directly towards one of those Enemy models until it contact that model.

feat-batter.name: Batter
feat-batter.subject: Personal
feat-batter.description: Until the End Phase, models Wounded by this model's Melee Attack gain a Stun Marker.

feat-battle_stations.name: Battle Stations
feat-battle_stations.subject: Personal
feat-battle_stations.description: This model gains Order [Ashigaru](3/8") until the End Phase.

feat-be_prepared.name: Be Prepared
feat-be_prepared.subject: Target
feat-be_prepared.description: Choose a Ronin Enhancement-Equipment card not already included in the Warband and Attach it to Target Blood Brother model.

feat-binding_roots.name: Binding Roots
feat-binding_roots.subject: Pulse
feat-binding_roots.description: Choose up to X Enemy models within the Pulse's area of effect. Each model chosen becomes Immobilised.

feat-binding_shadows.name: Binding Shadows
feat-binding_shadows.subject: Target
feat-binding_shadows.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains an Immobilised Marker at the end of the current activation.

feat-blade_dedication.name: Blade Dedication
feat-blade_dedication.subject: Pulse
feat-blade_dedication.description:
Choose an Enemy model in the Pulse to gain a Duel Token.
1 Friendly Samurai model in BtB with this model gains the Dedicated Blade Enhancement card, if permitted.
This feat may only be successfully used once per game.

feat-blade_finesse.name: Blade Finesse
feat-blade_finesse.subject: Personal
feat-blade_finesse.description: This model's weapons gain Pierce (2) until the current action is resolved.

feat-blazing_maelstrom.name: Blazing Maelstrom
feat-blazing_maelstrom.subject: Personal
feat-blazing_maelstrom.description:
Until the end of the current activation:
• this model gains Cloudwalk, +2 Walk Statistic and this model's Bujutsu Weapon gains +1 Strength and Fire (+1/1)
This Ki Feat may only be used once per activation.

feat-bless.name: Bless
feat-bless.subject: Special
feat-bless.description: A Friendly Unblessed model in BtB gains the Blessing of Steel Enhancement - Equipment card if permitted.

feat-blessing_of_the_kami.name: Blessing of the Kami
feat-blessing_of_the_kami.subject: Target
feat-blessing_of_the_kami.description: Target Friendly Faction, non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model gains a Virtue Token.

feat-blizzard.name: Blizzard
feat-blizzard.subject: Personal
feat-blizzard.description: All models are in Cover and gain Slow until the End Phase.

feat-blood_brothers.name: Blood Brothers
feat-blood_brothers.subject: Personal
feat-blood_brothers.description: When another Friendly Blood Brother model ends its activation you may become the Active Player again and begin this model's activation.

feat-blood_in_the_water.name: Blood in the Water
feat-blood_in_the_water.subject: Target
feat-blood_in_the_water.description: Target model gains a Bleed (1) Marker.

feat-bloodletting.name: Bloodletting
feat-bloodletting.subject: Target
feat-bloodletting.description: Target Friendly Oni in BtB suffers one Wound ignoring Armour and Tough. This model gains an Oni Blood Token.

feat-body_of_oak.name: Body of Oak
feat-body_of_oak.subject: Personal
feat-body_of_oak.description: This model gains Armour (X) until the current action is resolved. X cannot be greater than 3.

feat-brawn.name: Brawn
feat-brawn.subject: Personal
feat-brawn.description: This model's Ranged Weapon gains Brutal (1) and Reload (+1).

feat-buki_manipulation.name: Buki Manipulation
feat-buki_manipulation.subject: Personal
feat-buki_manipulation.description:
This model's Buki 23 Weapon gains one of the following until the end of the current Melee Exchange:
• Grapple Attack (1)
• Slam Attack (1)
• Reach
• Reduce the cost of any Special Attacks by 1

feat-call_the_horde.name: Call the Horde
feat-call_the_horde.subject: Special
feat-call_the_horde.description:
During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Bakemono model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route.
If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.

feat-cannon_manipulation.name: Cannon Manipulation
feat-cannon_manipulation.subject: Personal
feat-cannon_manipulation.description:
When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose one of the following until the current Ranged Attack Action is resolved:
• This model's Cannon Weapon gains Slam Attack (0).
• Draw a line between this model and the Target model. Any model the line crosses and any model within 1" of those models gain a Fire (2) Marker.
• If the attack is successful, centre a 2" Pulse on the Target model. Models within the Pulse suffer a Damage Roll with the same Success Level as the Target model and gain a Stunned Marker.

feat-capture_soul.name: Capture Soul
feat-capture_soul.subject: Pulse
feat-capture_soul.description: When a non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model is Killed, replace it with an Exhausted and Prone non-unique Kairai under your Control in the model's former location.

feat-cast_shadow.name: Cast Shadow
feat-cast_shadow.subject: Special
feat-cast_shadow.description:
Place a Shadow Terrain Element onto the Battlefield in BtB with this model.
Choose the type of Shadow when you use this feat.
If this model is killed or removed from play, immediately remove all Shadows from the Battlefield.

feat-cauterise.name: Cauterise
feat-cauterise.subject: Target
feat-cauterise.description: Remove any Disease and Bleed Markers from the Target model.

feat-chain_attack.name: Chain Attack
feat-chain_attack.subject: Personal
feat-chain_attack.description: This model gains Combo Attack (0) until the current action is resolved.

feat-chanyou.name: Chanyou
feat-chanyou.subject: Personal
feat-chanyou.description: Remove all Berserk, Blind, Death Sentence, Diseased, Fire, Impetuous, Poison, Spirit Block, and Stunned Markers from this model.

feat-chaos_bolt.name: Chaos Bolt
feat-chaos_bolt.subject: Target
feat-chaos_bolt.description: Target model gains a Poison 1, Bleed 1 and Fire 1 Marker.

feat-cheat_fate.name: Cheat Fate
feat-cheat_fate.subject: Pulse
feat-cheat_fate.description: Before a Friendly model would roll a dice for any type of test, spend X. Remove one dice that would be rolled for the test and after other dice have been rolled for the test add a dice with the value of X+1 to the test before determining the final result. X cannot be greater than 5.

feat-chill.name: Chill
feat-chill.subject: Target
feat-chill.description: Target Enemy model in BtB gains Slow until the End Phase.

feat-choke_hold.name: Choke Hold
feat-choke_hold.subject: Personal
feat-choke_hold.description:
This model gains Grapple Attack (0) and Grapple Defence (0) until the end of the current activation.
If this model successfully applies one of these Special Abilities, the Enemy model suffers one Wound.

feat-chudan.name: Chudan
feat-chudan.subject: Personal
feat-chudan.description: This model's Special Attacks and Defences are reduced to (0) cost until the End Phase.

feat-circular_strike.name: Circular Strike
feat-circular_strike.subject: Personal
feat-circular_strike.description:
This model gains Aware until the end of this activation, then makes a Ranged Attack against each other model (Friendly or Enemy) in Range and LoS, in any order and ignoring Camouflage.
These Attacks are not affected by the penalty for having made Ranged Attacks previously in the turn and do not roll the test if the target is in BtB with an Enemy model.

feat-cleansing.name: Cleansing
feat-cleansing.subject: Pulse
feat-cleansing.description: Remove up to X Control, Disease, Fire, Poison, or Spirit Block Markers from models with tha Pulse's area of effect. X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens spent.

feat-cleansing_flames.name: Cleansing Flames
feat-cleansing_flames.subject: Pulse
feat-cleansing_flames.description: Remove all Berserk, Blind, Controlled, Poison, and Spirit Block Markers from models in the Pulse and each model gains a Fire (1) Marker.

feat-cleave.name: Cleave
feat-cleave.subject: Personal
feat-cleave.description: This model gains Brutal (2) until the current action is resolved.

feat-cloud_of_flies.name: Cloud of Flies
feat-cloud_of_flies.subject: Aura
feat-cloud_of_flies.description:
Enemy models in, or entering the Aura's area of effect gain a Stunned Marker.
Models can only gain one Stunned Marker per turn as a result of this Ki Feat.

feat-cobra_strike.name: Cobra Strike
feat-cobra_strike.subject: Personal
feat-cobra_strike.description: This model gains Lightning Reflexes until the End Phase.

feat-coin.name: Coin
feat-coin.subject: Aura
feat-coin.description:
Friendly non-Kami Ronin models in the Aura when this Ki Feat is used gain 1 Ki Token.
Models in the Aura gain Bodyguard [Haiboku](3").

feat-cold_shatter.name: Cold Shatter
feat-cold_shatter.subject: Target
feat-cold_shatter.description: The next time Target model suffers Damage it suffers double the Damage, if that would be enough to Kill the Target. If not, this effect expires immediately.

feat-conditioning.name: Conditioning
feat-conditioning.subject: Personal
feat-conditioning.description: This model gains Resistance (2) until the end of the current activation.

feat-consume_soul.name: Consume Soul
feat-consume_soul.subject: Pulse
feat-consume_soul.description: When an enemy model is Killed within 3" of this model, this model may Heal X Wounds, where X is equal to the removed model's Ki Statistic.

feat-contagious_poison.name: Contagious Poison
feat-contagious_poison.subject: Target
feat-contagious_poison.description:
Perform an Opposed Ki test with Target Enemy Model. If successful, that model gains a Poison (2) Marker and a Stun Marker.
Regardless of success of the Opposed Ki Test, choose another Enemy model within 3" of the Target and immediately repeat this Ki Feat at no cost on the chosen model, ignoring Range, LoS, and Camouflage.
The chosen model is then considered the Target.
No model may be affected more than once by this Ki Feat in a turn.

feat-contemplate_existence.name: Contemplate Existence
feat-contemplate_existence.subject: Target
feat-contemplate_existence.description: Remove all Activation Counters from the Target.

feat-contemplate_no_mind.name: Contemplate No Mind
feat-contemplate_no_mind.subject: Target
feat-contemplate_no_mind.description:
Target loses all Activation Counters.
The Range of this feat may be measured from a Void Rift.
Add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

feat-corrupt_essence.name: Corrupt Essence
feat-corrupt_essence.subject: Target
feat-corrupt_essence.description:
Target Enemy Exhausted model gains 1 Control Marker and Disturb Flow (1/6") until the End Phase.
Remove the Control Marker in the End Phase.

feat-corrupting_shōmyō.name: Corrupting Shōmyō
feat-corrupting_shōmyō.subject: Aura
feat-corrupting_shōmyō.description: Enemy models within the Aura that spend any number of Ki Tokens gain 1 Control Marker after their current activation is complete.

feat-councils_shield.name: Council's Shield
feat-councils_shield.subject: Target
feat-councils_shield.description:
Target Bakemono gains an additional X unmarked Wound boxes until the End Phase. Mark Wounds on these Wound boxes first.
X cannot be greater than 3.

feat-cower.name: Cower
feat-cower.subject: Target
feat-cower.description: Until the End Phase Target Frightened Enemy model may only declare Disengage, Stand Up and Wait actions.

feat-craft_marionette.name: Craft Marionette
feat-craft_marionette.subject: Special
feat-craft_marionette.description:
Summon and Deploy a Marionette anywhere within 2" of this model and not in an Enemy model's ZoC. The Marionette receives a number of Ki Tokens equal to the X spent instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
This model cannot use 'Craft Marionette' if there is already a Marionette in this Warband.

feat-crashing_wave_strike.name: Crashing Wave Strike
feat-crashing_wave_strike.subject: Personal
feat-crashing_wave_strike.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Unblockable (1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-crushing_blow.name: Crushing Blow
feat-crushing_blow.subject: Personal
feat-crushing_blow.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Brutal (+1) and Pierce (2) until the end of the current activation. This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-curse_fate.name: Curse Fate
feat-curse_fate.subject: Target
feat-curse_fate.description:
Roll a number of D6 equal to 1 plus the SL of the Opposed Ki Test. Reroll 1s and dice with the same value until all dice have unique values.
Until the End Phase the Target considers any dice it rolls that match those rolled for this feat to be a value of 1.

feat-curse_of_doom.name: Curse of Doom
feat-curse_of_doom.subject: Target
feat-curse_of_doom.description: Place 4 Doom Tokens on Target model. During the Starting Phase remove a Doom Token. When the last Doom Token is removed the model suffers 7 Wounds.

feat-daikyu.name: Daikyu
feat-daikyu.subject: Target

feat-dance_of_dragons.name: Dance of Dragons
feat-dance_of_dragons.subject: Personal
feat-dance_of_dragons.description:
Until the activation is complete, this model gains the following Ranged Attack:
• Ranged Weapon Strength: +2
• Range Bands: 2/4/6
• Traits: Fire (2/1), Lightweight

feat-dark_from_light.name: Dark From Light
feat-dark_from_light.subject: Aura
feat-dark_from_light.description:
In the Aura:
• Satsui models in the Aura gain Spirit (+1).
• Non-Void Element models gain Spirit (-1).

feat-dark_summons.name: Dark Summons
feat-dark_summons.subject: Special
feat-dark_summons.description: Deploy any Oni or Onisho model that was not recruited by the Warband into play, exhausted, within 3" of this model with 3 Control Markers on it.If the summoned model ever has zero Control Markers, remove it from play.

feat-darkness.name: Darkness
feat-darkness.subject: Special
feat-darkness.description: Until the End Phase all Non-Soulless, Non-Sixth Sense, Non-Bakemono models may only draw LoS up to 4".

feat-dart.name: Dart
feat-dart.subject: Personal
feat-dart.description: Walk this model its Walk Statistic in inches.

feat-dash.name: Dash
feat-dash.subject: Personal
feat-dash.description: This model gains Agile and Evasive until the end of the current activation, and may also move 2" at the end of its activation.

feat-dashuhua.name: Dashuhua
feat-dashuhua.subject: Aura
feat-dashuhua.description: Models in the Aura gain Cover. Enemy models moving into the Aura gain a Fire (2) Marker. This model cannot use this feat if it has no Ammo Tokens.

feat-dead_eye.name: Dead Eye
feat-dead_eye.subject: Personal
feat-dead_eye.description: Until the end of the activation this model ignores Cover and Tiny modifiers to Ranged Attacks. The Opposing Player may not nominate a new Target for this Ranged Attack.

feat-death_sentence.name: Death Sentence
feat-death_sentence.subject: Target
feat-death_sentence.description: Target Enemy model gains a Death Sentence Marker.

feat-debana.name: Debana
feat-debana.subject: Personal
feat-debana.description: After causing Damage in a Melee Exchange this model may move away from the Defender until it leaves its ZoC, at which point its movement ends.

feat-defensive_line.name: Defensive Line
feat-defensive_line.subject: Personal
feat-defensive_line.description:
Until the End Phase, while in BtB with another Friendly Tengu Bushi, this model and Friendly Tengu Bushi in BtB with this model gain Parry (+1).
A model can only benefit from this feat once, though it does stack with other sources of Parry.

feat-defensive_stroke.name: Defensive Stroke
feat-defensive_stroke.subject: Personal
feat-defensive_stroke.description: This model gains Parry (+1) until the End Phase.

feat-deference.name: Deference
feat-deference.subject: Personal
feat-deference.description:
When an Enemy non-Samurai, non-Ashigaru model declares an action which will either bring it into BtB with this model, or Targets this model with a Ranged Attack or Ki Feat, it must make a Challenge (5) Ki Test.
If the Enemy model is successful resolve the Action as normal.
If unsuccessful its activation ends before any movement and it removes an Activation Counter.
This is a Trap effect.

feat-detect.name: Detect
feat-detect.subject: Pulse
feat-detect.description: Choose a model in the Pulse. That model loses Camouflage until the End Phase.

feat-dharma.name: Dharma
feat-dharma.subject: Target
feat-dharma.description:
When Target, non-Exhausted model next activates, you may choose a valid Simple Action for it to perform.
The model's Controller must resolve the chosen Action.
If the Target does not Activate before the End Phase, this effect expires.

feat-diplomatic_immunity.name: Diplomatic Immunity
feat-diplomatic_immunity.subject: Aura
feat-diplomatic_immunity.description: Non-Soulless Enemy models in the Aura and non- Soulless models in BtB with them lose Aggressive, may not place dice in Attack or use Special Defences in a Melee Exchange or Target this model with Ki Feats.

feat-dirty_fighting.name: Dirty Fighting
feat-dirty_fighting.subject: Personal
feat-dirty_fighting.description: Enemy models cannot declare the use of Special Attacks or Defences in Melee Exchanges with this model until the current activation is resolved.

feat-discordant_melody.name: Discordant Melody
feat-discordant_melody.subject: Personal
feat-discordant_melody.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (1/3") until the End Phase.

feat-distraction.name: Distraction
feat-distraction.subject: Target
feat-distraction.description: Target Enemy model must perform a Ki Challenge Test (6). If it fails you may change that model's Facing.

feat-distracting_fan.name: Distracting Fan
feat-distracting_fan.subject: Special
feat-distracting_fan.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it entered into BtB with, or Targets another Fan Dancer model with a Ranged Attack or Ki Feat, but before any Melee Exchange begins, place that Fan Dancer model within 2" of its current location. The Enemy model's action is then considered resolved.

feat-distracting_strike.name: Distracting Strike
feat-distracting_strike.subject: Target
feat-distracting_strike.description:
While this model would provide a Melee Assist, that Fan Dancer's opponent may not use Ki Boosts.
This feat can be used even if this assist is ignored (e.g. by the Indomitable trait).

feat-divert_energy.name: Divert Energy
feat-divert_energy.subject: Personal
feat-divert_energy.description: Until the End Phase, when this model would roll Damage for a Melee attack, it may instead inflict 1 Wound (Ignoring Tough) and Heal 1 Wound or remove 1 Ki Token from the Enemy model and gain that Ki Token.

feat-do-kote.name: Do-Kote
feat-do-kote.subject: Personal
feat-do-kote.description: This model gains Feint (1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-dominate.name: Dominate
feat-dominate.subject: Target
feat-dominate.description:
Target non-Exhausted Enemy model must be chosen to activate next, ignoring Impetuous Markers.
The Opposing Player may not declare the use of a Pass Token next activation.

feat-dragons_awe.name: Dragon's Awe
feat-dragons_awe.subject: Personal
feat-dragons_awe.description: This model gains Believer [Shisai] (1/2") until the End Phase.

feat-dragons_focus.name: Dragon's Focus
feat-dragons_focus.subject: Personal
feat-dragons_focus.description: This model gains Mettle (1) until the end of the current activation.

feat-dragons_presence.name: Dragon's Presence
feat-dragons_presence.subject: Personal
feat-dragons_presence.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (1/2") until the End Phase.

feat-dramatic_entrance.name: Dramatic Entrance
feat-dramatic_entrance.subject: Special
feat-dramatic_entrance.description: When this model is Deployed from Flank, turn all Enemy models to directly face it after it is deployed.

feat-duty.name: Duty
feat-duty.subject: Personal
feat-duty.description: This model loses Insignificant until the end of the current activation.

feat-eagle_eye.name: Eagle Eye
feat-eagle_eye.subject: Personal
feat-eagle_eye.description: The Medium Ranged Band of this model's Ranged Weapon is unlimited until the end of the current action.

feat-earthen_rampart_stance.name: Earthen Rampart Stance
feat-earthen_rampart_stance.subject: Personal
feat-earthen_rampart_stance.description: This model gains Parry (1) and Friendly models within 2" of this model have Cover until the End Phase or this model Walks.

feat-elders_aegis.name: Elders' Aegis
feat-elders_aegis.subject: Target
feat-elders_aegis.description: Choose a State other than Reloading. Target model gains Immune [Chosen State] until the End Phase.

feat-electrify.name: Electrify
feat-electrify.subject: Personal
feat-electrify.description: Until the End Phase, when this model Damages or is Damaged by an Enemy model with a Melee Attack, that model gains a Stunned Marker and you may push that model 1" directly away from this model.

feat-empower.name: Empower
feat-empower.subject: Target
feat-empower.description:
While Target Friendly Metal Kami is within 6" of an Enemy model, Friendly models with no other Friendly models within 3" of them gain Armour (X).
X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on the Kami.

feat-empower_the_void.name: Empower the Void
feat-empower_the_void.subject: Pulse
feat-empower_the_void.description: If an Enemy model in the Pulse spends Ki for any reason, add a Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

feat-encourage.name: Encourage
feat-encourage.subject: Target
feat-encourage.description: Target other Friendly model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

feat-endless_gnawing.name: Endless Gnawing
feat-endless_gnawing.subject: Pulse
feat-endless_gnawing.description:
When a Friendly Rat model in the Pulse ends its activation, you become the Active Player again and begin an activation with this model.
This Ki Feat cannot be used if this model is Exhausted.

feat-enliven.name: Enliven
feat-enliven.subject: Personal
feat-enliven.description: This model loses Slow until the end of the current activation.

feat-enmity.name: Enmity
feat-enmity.subject: Target
feat-enmity.description: Choose a model descriptor. Target Friendly model gains Vengeance [chosen descriptor] until the end of the current activation.

feat-enthusiasm.name: Enthusiasm
feat-enthusiasm.subject: Personal
feat-enthusiasm.description:
This model gains Rapid Fire (3) until the end of the current activation.
During a Ranged Attack Action, for each Ranged Attack that has already been successful this activation, this model's Bombs Weapon increases its long range by 2".

feat-entice.name: Entice
feat-entice.subject: Target
feat-entice.description:
Perform a Walk with Target Enemy model directly toward this model equal to its Move statistic in inches.
At the end of the Walk the Enemy model must directly face this model.

feat-envelop.name: Envelop
feat-envelop.subject: Target
feat-envelop.description: When this model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange, after the activation is complete, the Enemy model becomes Immobilised.

feat-enveloping_mists.name: Enveloping Mists
feat-enveloping_mists.subject: Aura
feat-enveloping_mists.description: The Aura's area is considered a [Normal, Obscuring, Huge] terrain element and Friendly Kairai in the Aura gain Tireless.

feat-envigorate.name: Envigorate
feat-envigorate.subject: Target
feat-envigorate.description: Target Friendly Non-Soulless, Non-Animal model gains an Activation Counter.

feat-escape.name: Escape
feat-escape.subject: Personal
feat-escape.description: When this model Kills an Enemy model, once the action is complete, this model may make a Walk.

feat-exceptional_defence.name: Exceptional Defence
feat-exceptional_defence.description: If Eagle's Flight Defence is successful this model may Walk 3" after the Melee Exchange is resolved.

feat-eye_peck.name: Eye Peck
feat-eye_peck.subject: Personal
feat-eye_peck.description: When this model causes Damage with its Bird Strike Weapon, the Target gains a Blind Marker.

feat-eyes_of_yurei.name: Eyes of Yurei
feat-eyes_of_yurei.subject: Personal
feat-eyes_of_yurei.description: This model gains Sixth Sense until the End Phase.

feat-faith.name: Faith
feat-faith.subject: Target
feat-faith.description: Target Villager model reduces the cost of all Ki Feats by 1 until the current action is resolved.

feat-far_shot.name: Far Shot
feat-far_shot.subject: Personal
feat-far_shot.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become 6/12/18 until the End Phase.

feat-far_throw.name: Far Throw
feat-far_throw.subject: Personal
feat-far_throw.description: This model's Ranged Weapon Range Bands become 4/8/12 until the End Phase.

feat-fathers_instruction.name: Father's Instruction
feat-fathers_instruction.subject: Personal
feat-fathers_instruction.description: This model gains Kata until the End Phase.

feat-fend.name: Fend
feat-fend.subject: Personal
feat-fend.description: This model gains Push Attack (0) until the end of the current activation.

feat-final_verdict.name: Final Verdict
feat-final_verdict.subject: Target
feat-final_verdict.description:
Your Opponent must choose either a Death Sentence marker or a Control Marker.
Target Enemy model gains one of the chosen Marker.

feat-fire_spin.name: Fire Spin
feat-fire_spin.subject: Personal
feat-fire_spin.description:
Walk this model 4" in a straight line in any direction. Any model within 2" of this model at any point in its path gains a Fire (2) Marker.
Until the End Phase, whilst this model is in play, models making Ranged Attacks suffer a +1 modifier to the Challenge Number of Ranged Attack Tests.
In the next Starting Phase, the player who wins the Tactical Test moves this model 4" in a straight line in any direction, then the other player moves him 2" in a straight line in any direction. Any model within 2" of this model at any point in its path gains a Fire (2) Marker then this effect ends.

feat-firm_resolve.name: Firm Resolve
feat-firm_resolve.subject: Pulse
feat-firm_resolve.description: When a Friendly Suzume model in the Pulse fails a Fear Test, it gains Steadfast until the end of the current Activation.

feat-fists_of_iron.name: Fists of Iron
feat-fists_of_iron.subject: Personal
feat-fists_of_iron.description:
This model's Melee Weapons gain +X Melee Strength until the current Melee Exchange is resolved. X cannot be greater than 3.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-flame_arrows.name: Flame Arrows
feat-flame_arrows.subject: Personal
feat-flame_arrows.description:
Deploy a 50mm base on the table within LoS and within 15" of this model.
Until the End Phase the area of the base is [Normal, Blocking, Large] terrain.
This feat cannot be used while this model has a Reload Marker.
This model gains a Reload Marker.

feat-flame_on!.name: Flame On!
feat-flame_on!.subject: Personal
feat-flame_on!.description: Until the End Phase, this model's Melee Weapons gain Fire (1/2) and if this model suffers Wounds from a Melee Attack, the Attacking model gains a Fire (1) Marker.

feat-flame_on.name: Flame On
feat-flame_on.subject: Personal
feat-flame_on.description: Until the End Phase, this model's Melee Attack gains the Fire (1/1) trait and when this model suffers Wounds from a Melee Attack, the Attacking model gains a Fire (1) Marker.

feat-flame_whip.name: Flame Whip
feat-flame_whip.subject: Target
feat-flame_whip.description:
During an Enemy model's Activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Fire (2) Marker.
A model may only gain one Fire Marker per activation as a result of this Ki Feat.

feat-flitter.name: Flitter
feat-flitter.subject: Personal
feat-flitter.description: This first time this turn an Enemy model Walks into BtB with this model, place this model within 2" of its current location, but not into an Enemy model's ZoC.

feat-flow_like_water.name: Flow Like Water
feat-flow_like_water.subject: Personal
feat-flow_like_water.description: This model gains Dodge(1) and Counterstrike Defence(0) until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-fluster.name: Fluster
feat-fluster.subject: Target
feat-fluster.description:
Target Enemy model gains an Impetuous Marker.
Until the End Phase, while the Enemy model has an Impetuous Marker, it may not Target or declare actions that will bring it into BtB with Friendly Ito models that have Impetuous Markers.

feat-fog.name: Fog
feat-fog.subject: Aura
feat-fog.description: The Aura's area is considered a [Normal, Obscuring, Huge] terrain element.

feat-fog_of_hesitation.name: Fog of Hesitation
feat-fog_of_hesitation.subject: Pulse
feat-fog_of_hesitation.description: One model within the Pulse may not be chosen as the Activating model until all other models in its Warband are Exhausted.

feat-forbidden_censure.name: Forbidden Censure
feat-forbidden_censure.subject: Target
feat-forbidden_censure.description:
Target gains a Death Sentence Marker.
Choose another Enemy model (that has not been Targeted by this feat this activation) within 3" of the Target and immediately repeat this Ki Feat on the new model, ignoring Range, LoS and Camouflage.
The Range of this feat may be measured from a Void Rift.
This feat may affect a maximum of X Enemy models in 1 action.

feat-forbidden_force.name: Forbidden Force
feat-forbidden_force.subject: Personal
feat-forbidden_force.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (X) until the current activation is complete.

feat-force_manipulation.name: Force Manipulation
feat-force_manipulation.subject: Personal
feat-force_manipulation.description:
When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose 1 of the following until the current Ranged Attack Action is resolved:
• Ranged Weapon Range Bands become 4/8/12
• Ranged Strength +1
• This model's Ranged Weapon gains Slam Attack (0)

feat-foresight.name: Foresight
feat-foresight.subject: Pulse
feat-foresight.description: After the dice for a Melee Exchange in the Pulse have been rolled and final results determined, you may reallocate Melee dice, choose a different Special Attack or Defence and both players reroll.The Opponent must keep the same dice allocation and Special Attack or Defence. Any Ki Feats used are still in effect.

feat-forestall.name: Forestall
feat-forestall.subject: Target
feat-forestall.description: Target Enemy model may not declare Scenario Actions this turn.

feat-fortunes_favour.name: Fortune's Favour
feat-fortunes_favour.subject: Aura
feat-fortunes_favour.description:
This model may spend X Ki Tokens to reroll X dice rolled for a test by a model within the Aura, before the final result of the test is determined.
Each dice can only be rerolled once as a result of this Ki Feat.

feat-four_hand_technique.name: Four Hand Technique
feat-four_hand_technique.subject: Personal
feat-four_hand_technique.description: This model gains Throw Attack (0) and Throw Defence (0) until the end of the current activation.

feat-frenzy.name: Frenzy
feat-frenzy.subject: Personal
feat-frenzy.description:
Add X additional attack dice to each exchange when using Split Attack until the End Phase.
X is equal to the number of Enemy models in BtB with this model.

feat-frenzied_rhythm.name: Frenzied Rhythm
feat-frenzied_rhythm.subject: Pulse
feat-frenzied_rhythm.description: Each Friendly Bakemono within the Pulse gains 1 Virtue Token.

feat-fresh_meat.name: Fresh Meat
feat-fresh_meat.subject: Target
feat-fresh_meat.description: Target Friendly Kairai loses Slow until the End Phase.

feat-from_below....name: From Below...
feat-from_below....subject: Special
feat-from_below....description: Deploy a non-Unique Gashadokuro model in BtB with this model but not in an Enemy model's ZoC.

feat-frozen_mountain_fist.name: Frozen Mountain Fist
feat-frozen_mountain_fist.subject: Personal
feat-frozen_mountain_fist.description:
This model's Melee Weapon gains Sharp (1).
After conducting re-rolls for a Melee Exchange, you may remove this model's highest Defence dice and then add an Attack dice of the same value before determining final results.

feat-fujins_will.name: Fujin's Will
feat-fujins_will.subject: Pulse
feat-fujins_will.description:
Friendly models with Cloudwalk that are within the Pulse may be placed within 2" of their current position.
This feat does not affect models in BtB with Enemy models.
Models cannot be placed into an Enemy ZoC.

feat-fukku.name: Fukku
feat-fukku.subject: Target
feat-fukku.description: Target Enemy model must succeed at a Size Challenge Test (5) or be placed anywhere in BtB with this model. Immediately begin a Melee Exchange with the Target model. This only removes one Activation Counter

feat-fumeiryo.name: Fumeiryo
feat-fumeiryo.subject: Personal
feat-fumeiryo.description: Deploy a 50mm base on the table within LoS and 6" of this model. Until the End Phase the area of the base is [Normal, Blocking, Large] terrain. This model cannot use this feat if it has no Ammo Tokens.

feat-fumidashi.name: Fumidashi
feat-fumidashi.subject: Aura
feat-fumidashi.description: Choose a model completely within a Scenario Zone. That model does not count as being in the zone when calculating Zone Control this turn.

feat-future_sight.name: Future Sight
feat-future_sight.subject: Personal
feat-future_sight.description: This model gains Tactician (1) until the End Phase and Enemy models lose Tactician until the End Phase.

feat-gamblers_ruin.name: Gambler's Ruin
feat-gamblers_ruin.subject: Target
feat-gamblers_ruin.description:
Until the End Phase, when Target model performs a Test, their Controller rolls an additional die.
This model's Controller must remove a dice of their choice from that Test before it is resolved.
For a Melee Exchange, this occurs after dice allocation is revealed.
The additional dice may be Attack or Defence and the removed dice must be of the same type.

feat-game_hunter.name: Game Hunter
feat-game_hunter.subject: Personal
feat-game_hunter.description: The model's Ranged Weapons gain Sharp (1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-gang.name: Gang
feat-gang.subject: Personal
feat-gang.description: This model gains Co-ordinated Attack (Ashigaru) until the End Phase.

feat-genki.name: Genki
feat-genki.subject: Personal
feat-genki.description: This model gains Charging Bonus [Fearless] but loses the Ashigaru Type until the end of the current activation.

feat-ghost_fire.name: Ghost Fire
feat-ghost_fire.subject: Pulse
feat-ghost_fire.description:
Transfer 1 Ki Token from all models in the Pulse to this model, each model that transferred a Ki Token suffers 1 Wound.
Wounds caused by this effect ignore Tough.
X is equal to the number of Ghost Tokens on this model.

feat-goh.name: Goh
feat-goh.subject: Personal
feat-goh.description: For the next Rope Dart Ranged attack, if successful, move the Target Small or Tiny model directly toward this model until it contacts Impassable Terrain or any model.

feat-grapple.name: Grapple
feat-grapple.subject: Personal
feat-grapple.description: This model gains Grapple Attack (0) until the end of the current activation.

feat-grasp_of_darkness.name: Grasp of Darkness
feat-grasp_of_darkness.subject: Target
feat-grasp_of_darkness.description: Target Enemy model gains Slow and Weak until the End Phase.

feat-grasping_shadows.name: Grasping Shadows
feat-grasping_shadows.subject: Personal
feat-grasping_shadows.description: This model gains Split Attack until the current action is resolved.

feat-grip_of_the_void.name: Grip of the Void
feat-grip_of_the_void.subject: Target
feat-grip_of_the_void.description: Targeted model gains one Immobilised Marker.

feat-hack.name: Hack
feat-hack.subject: Personal
feat-hack.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Powerful Attack (0) until the current action is resolved.

feat-hadori_finish.name: Hadori Finish
feat-hadori_finish.subject: Target
feat-hadori_finish.description: Target model's Melee Weapons gain Pierce (+1) until the End Phase.

feat-hageshiku_furu.name: Hageshiku Furu
feat-hageshiku_furu.subject: Pulse
feat-hageshiku_furu.description:
This model gains Aware and the following Ranged Weapon until this feat is resolved.
This model then makes a Ranged Attack against each other model (Friendly or Enemy) in Range and LoS, in any order and ignoring Camouflage. These Attacks are not affected by the penalty for having made Ranged Attacks previously in the turn and do not roll the test if the target is in BtB with an Enemy model.
• Ranged Weapon Strength: +2
• Range Bands: -/-/4
•Traits: Brutal(1)

feat-hail_of_steel.name: Hail of Steel
feat-hail_of_steel.subject: Personal
feat-hail_of_steel.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (3) until the end of the current activation.

feat-hammer_strike.name: Hammer Strike
feat-hammer_strike.subject: Personal
feat-hammer_strike.description: This model gains Unblockable (1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-haunting_vision.name: Haunting Vision
feat-haunting_vision.subject: Personal
feat-haunting_vision.description: This model gains Terror until the End Phase.

feat-hayai.name: Hayai
feat-hayai.subject: Personal
feat-hayai.description:
While this model is involved in a Melee Exchange, your Opponent may not use Instant or Active Effects.
This effect ends once the current activation is complete.
This feat always resolves before other Instant or Active Effects, regardless of the usual Active Player Rules Conflict resolution and can be used to prevent an Enemy model using a declared feat (No Enemy resources are expended).

feat-headshot.name: Headshot
feat-headshot.subject: Target
feat-headshot.description: Target model's Ranged Weapons gain Critical Attack (0) against Enemy Kairai models.

feat-healing_touch.name: Healing Touch
feat-healing_touch.subject: Target
feat-healing_touch.description: Target Friendly model in BtB Heals X wounds.

feat-heave.name: Heave
feat-heave.subject: Personal
feat-heave.description: This model's Ranged Weapon Range Bands become 3/6/9 until the End Phase.

feat-heed_my_word.name: Heed My Word
feat-heed_my_word.subject: Target
feat-heed_my_word.description: Perform a Walk with the Target model. If the Target model is an Enemy, you must first succeed in an Opposed Ki Test with the Target model.

feat-here_boy!.name: Here Boy!
feat-here_boy!.subject: Pulse
feat-here_boy!.description: Place a Friendly Dog model in the Pulse's area of effect into BtB with this model, but not in BtB with an Enemy model or Enemy ZoC

feat-heros_dilemma.name: Hero's Dilemma
feat-heros_dilemma.subject: Target
feat-heros_dilemma.description:
Opponent chooses up to two valid Actions for the Target model. You may veto one Action.
The model must perform the other Action if able. If it cannot do so, or if there are no remaining Actions, it becomes Exhausted.

feat-hoarfrost.name: Hoarfrost
feat-hoarfrost.subject: Target
feat-hoarfrost.description: After a Melee Exchange with this model is complete, Target Enemy model becomes Held.

feat-hold_the_line!.name: Hold the Line!
feat-hold_the_line!.subject: Personal
feat-hold_the_line!.description:
During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Ashigaru model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route.
If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.

feat-hope.name: Hope
feat-hope.subject: Target
feat-hope.description: Target Friendly Villager or Peasant model may re-roll one die from any test or Damage Roll until the end of the current activation.

feat-horrify.name: Horrify
feat-horrify.subject: Pulse
feat-horrify.description:
Enemy models in the Pulse gain a Frightened Marker.
X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on this model after paying for this Ki Feat.

feat-hot_shot.name: Hot Shot
feat-hot_shot.subject: Personal
feat-hot_shot.description: This model's Arquebus weapon gains Fire (1/2) until the current action is resolved.

feat-hunt.name: Hunt
feat-hunt.subject: Target
feat-hunt.description: Target Friendly model gains Tireless until the End Phase.

feat-hyper_regeneration.name: Hyper Regeneration
feat-hyper_regeneration.subject: Personal
feat-hyper_regeneration.description: This model gains Regenerate (4) until the End Phase.

feat-hypnotic_gaze.name: Hypnotic Gaze
feat-hypnotic_gaze.subject: Target
feat-hypnotic_gaze.description: Target enemy model loses an Activation Counter and gains one Stunned Marker.

feat-iaijutsu.name: Iaijutsu
feat-iaijutsu.subject: Personal
feat-iaijutsu.description: This model's weapons gain Reach until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-icy_veins.name: Icy Veins
feat-icy_veins.subject: Target
feat-icy_veins.description: Target model gains Fearless, Durable [Ranged], and Slow until the End Phase. If Target is an Enemy, you must succeed in an Opposed Ki Test.

feat-idolise.name: Idolise
feat-idolise.subject: Target
feat-idolise.description: Target Friendly Faction model with a Rice Cost of more than this model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

feat-illusion.name: Illusion
feat-illusion.subject: Target
feat-illusion.description: Target Enemy model gains a Blind marker.

feat-impatient.name: Impatient
feat-impatient.subject: Personal
feat-impatient.description: This model gains an Impetuous Marker.

feat-imperial_decree.name: Imperial Decree
feat-imperial_decree.subject: Aura
feat-imperial_decree.description: Models in the Aura cannot perform Scenario Actions.

feat-imperial_seal.name: Imperial Seal
feat-imperial_seal.subject: Personal
feat-imperial_seal.description:
When this model is Targeted with a Ki Feat or Action by an Enemy non-Soulless, non-Insignificant, non-Animal model, the Opposing Player must choose a different valid Target for the Action or Ki Feat.
If there is no other legal Target then the Enemy model's action ends. Remove an Activation Counter as normal.

feat-improvise.name: Improvise
feat-improvise.subject: Personal
feat-improvise.description:
Your opponent may not use Instant or Active Effects until the end of the current Activation.
Apply any one non-Exceptional Special Attack and any one non-Exceptional Special Defence to this model's Melee Exchange at no cost this Activation.This model can only use these Special Abilities this activation.
After the activation ends, this model may Walk up to its Walk Statistic in inches.

feat-inaris_luck.name: Inari's Luck
feat-inaris_luck.subject: Pulse
feat-inaris_luck.description:
When a Friendly model in the Pulse makes a Test or a Damage Roll, it may reroll one of its own dice in that test or roll.
Dice may only be rerolled once due to this Ki Feat.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-inertia.name: Inertia
feat-inertia.subject: Personal
feat-inertia.description: When this model makes a successful Ranged Attack this Activation against an Enemy model, push that model 1" directly away from this model.

feat-inferno.name: Inferno
feat-inferno.subject: Pulse
feat-inferno.description: All other models within the Pulse's area of effect gain a Fire (2) Marker.

feat-insight.name: Insight
feat-insight.subject: Personal
feat-insight.description:
This model gains Tactician (+1) for the next Tactical Test.
This model automatically wins Tie Breaks on Tactical Tests until the End Phase.

feat-inspiration.name: Inspiration
feat-inspiration.subject: Target
feat-inspiration.description: Target Friendly Faction model with a Rice Cost of less than this model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

feat-inspiring_shōmyō.name: Inspiring Shōmyō
feat-inspiring_shōmyō.subject: Aura
feat-inspiring_shōmyō.description: This model gains Leadership [Friendly](2/6") and Friendly models in the Aura can reroll Ki Tests and Fear Tests.

feat-instil_envy.name: Instil Envy
feat-instil_envy.subject: Target
feat-instil_envy.description:
Target model cannot use Ki Feats that Target Friendly models other than itself and can only declare actions that Target Enemy models if the Target has a higher Rice Cost than itself (Treat no Rice Cost as zero).
This effect lasts until the End Phase.

feat-instil_gluttony.name: Instil Gluttony
feat-instil_gluttony.subject: Target
feat-instil_gluttony.description:
Target model gains a Control Marker and, while it has any Control Markers from this Ki Feat, the Target gains the following Weapon:
Gluttonous Maw:
• Melee Strength: -1
This model must always choose to use this weapon in a Melee Exchange.
At the end of an Activation during which this model dealt Damage with this Weapon, it does not remove a Control Marker.

feat-instil_sloth.name: Instil Sloth
feat-instil_sloth.subject: Target
feat-instil_sloth.description:
Target Enemy model gains Slow until the End Phase.
If the Target declares a Ranged or Melee Action it may not make the usual Walk associated with that action.

feat-instil_wrath.name: Instil Wrath
feat-instil_wrath.subject: Target
feat-instil_wrath.description: Target Enemy model becomes Berserk until the End Phase.

feat-instructional_swipe.name: Instructional Swipe
feat-instructional_swipe.subject: Pulse
feat-instructional_swipe.description: When a Friendly Prefecture model in the Pulse fails a Fear Test; it instead passes that Test and loses one Wound.

feat-insurgent.name: Insurgent
feat-insurgent.subject: Special
feat-insurgent.description:
This Feat can only be used while this model is Elsewhere.
When an Enemy model deploys using the Flank Trait, this model may ignore its current Deployment choices for its Flank Trait and Deploy within 3" of the Enemy model but not in its ZoC or BtB.
This model generates two Activation Counters when Deployed using this Feat.

feat-intercept.name: Intercept
feat-intercept.subject: Pulse
feat-intercept.description:
When a Friendly model in the Pulse is selected for a Melee Action or targeted by a Charge Action, this model becomes the new selected or targeted model.
If the Enemy model has enough movement to reach the original model, it is instead moved into BtB with this model by the shortest route, regardless of its actual movement.

feat-ire.name: Ire
feat-ire.subject: Target
feat-ire.description:
Target Enemy model becomes Berserk until the end of its next activation. While Berserk, it treats all models as Enemy models.
Until the End Phase, this model gains 1 Ki Token for each Wound caused by the Target in a Melee Exchange.

feat-irokane_protection.name: Irokane Protection
feat-irokane_protection.subject: Target
feat-irokane_protection.description: Target model gains Fear (4) and Weapons used in Attacks made against that model gain Pierce (-2) (to a minimum of 0) until the end of the current activation.

feat-iron_arm.name: Iron Arm
feat-iron_arm.subject: Personal
feat-iron_arm.description: This model gains Parry (1) and Tough (1) until the end of the current activation.

feat-jump_em.name: Jump Em!
feat-jump_em.subject: Pulse
feat-jump_em.description:
This model gains Command [Shatei](X/X"). Choose X Friendly Shatei models in the Pulse to gain a Virtue Token.
Friendly Shatei models on the Battlefield gain Co-ordinated Attack [Shatei].

feat-kannagara.name: Kannagara
feat-kannagara.subject: Target
feat-kannagara.description: Until the End Phase, if Target Enemy model declares an action other than Focus it gains a Control Marker once the action is resolved, unless it has a Control Marker when the action is declared.

feat-katakuchi.name: Katakuchi
feat-katakuchi.subject: Target
feat-katakuchi.description:
This model and Target Friendly model gain Aggressive, Fearless, Resistance (1), and Unstable until the End Phase.
This Ki Feat cannot be used if this model has no Ammo Tokens.

feat-kawasu.name: Kawasu
feat-kawasu.subject: Personal
feat-kawasu.description: Enemy models cannot declare the use of Special Attacks and Defences in Melee Exchanges with this model until the current activation is resolved.

feat-keirō.name: Keirō
feat-keirō.subject: Target
feat-keirō.description: Target Friendly Samurai model with a Rice Cost of more than this model gains +1 to its Melee pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

feat-ki_mirror.name: Ki Mirror
feat-ki_mirror.subject: Pulse
feat-ki_mirror.description: When a non-Soulless model within 6" becomes the Target of a Ki Feat you may choose a new, valid Target for the Ki Feat, ignoring the feat's Range.

feat-kill_or_cure.name: Kill or Cure
feat-kill_or_cure.subject: Target
feat-kill_or_cure.description:
Target model that you own makes a Ki Challenge Test (5).
If successful, unmark all Wound boxes.
If it fails, the Target is Killed.

feat-kinjite.name: Kinjite
feat-kinjite.subject: Aura
feat-kinjite.description: Choose any Special Attack or Defence. Models within the Aura may not declare use of that Special Ability.

feat-kiss_of_the_rose.name: Kiss of the Rose
feat-kiss_of_the_rose.subject: Target
feat-kiss_of_the_rose.description:
During a non-Soulless, Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Control Marker.
No Melee Exchange takes place, this model does not lose an Activation Counter.

feat-kote-men.name: Kote-Men
feat-kote-men.subject: Personal
feat-kote-men.description: This model gains Feint (+1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-lay_makibishi.name: Lay Makibishi
feat-lay_makibishi.subject: Special
feat-lay_makibishi.description:
Deploy a Makibishi terrain element template in BtB with this model.
Whenever a model without Cloudwalk or Intangible moves into, or starts its movement within the Makibishi terrain element, it must make a Walk Challenge Test (8) if it is performing a Charge or Run Action, or Walk Challenge Test (7) otherwise.
If unsuccessful the model's movement and activation immediately ends.

feat-linked_swords.name: Linked Swords
feat-linked_swords.subject: Personal
feat-linked_swords.description: This model gains Reach and its Hook Swords Weapon gains Chain Weapon (1) until the end of the current activation.

feat-long_throw.name: Long Throw
feat-long_throw.subject: Special
feat-long_throw.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become 3/6/9 until the End Phase.

feat-look_into_the_void.name: Look into the Void
feat-look_into_the_void.subject: Target
feat-look_into_the_void.description:
Target Enemy model which has LoS to this model, make a Success Level 4 Damage Roll on the Target model.
Wounds caused by this Ki Feat ignore Armour.
A model can only be Targeted by this feat (from any source) once per turn.

feat-loyalty.name: Loyalty
feat-loyalty.subject: Personal
feat-loyalty.description: This model gains Bodyguard [Friendly](1") until the End Phase.

feat-lure.name: Lure
feat-lure.subject: Target
feat-lure.description:
Target model not in BtB with a Friendly model gains an Impetuous Marker, must declare a Walk Action as its next activation, and must move directly towards this model with its full move changing its facing so that this model is in LoS. If unable to perform a Walk Action, it may activate without restriction.
This effect expires in the End Phase.

feat-lurker.name: Lurker
feat-lurker.subject: Personal
feat-lurker.description: This model gains Camouflage (2) until the End Phase.

feat-madamada.name: Madamada
feat-madamada.subject: Target
feat-madamada.description: When an Enemy model Walks, in its own activation, into BtB with Target Friendly model, after its Walk is complete, Walk the Enemy model directly away from the Friendly model until it leaves its ZoC.

feat-majesty.name: Majesty
feat-majesty.subject: Aura
feat-majesty.description:
While within the Aura, each inch moved counts as 2 inches for any Enemy model's movement.
This model cannot be Targeted by Enemy Effects, and Enemy models cannot enter BtB with this model.

feat-manifest_fear.name: Manifest Fear
feat-manifest_fear.subject: Target
feat-manifest_fear.description: This model and a Friendly 'Animal - Rat' model switch places. This feat may be used while this model is Elsewhere.

feat-many_as_one.name: Many as One
feat-many_as_one.subject: Special
feat-many_as_one.description:
Summon and Deploy a Sagoya Kaidan within 3" of Target Enemy model.
It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Sagoya Kaidan's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Sagoya Kaidan in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Sagoya Kaidan in play.

feat-marching_beat.name: Marching Beat
feat-marching_beat.subject: Pulse
feat-marching_beat.description: All Bakemono not in BtB with an Enemy model within the Pulse's area of effect may make a 2" Walk.

feat-martyr.name: Martyr
feat-martyr.subject: Pulse
feat-martyr.description: Transfer X State Markers that are not Disguise, Held, Prone, or Reload Markers from a model in the Pulse to this model.

feat-masters_call.name: Master's Call
feat-masters_call.subject: Special
feat-masters_call.description:
Summon a Small Swarm of Rats by Deploying it in BtB with Gendo or another Small Swarm of Rats.
After Deploying the Small Swarm of Rats in BtB with this model you may remove this model and place it Elsewhere.
The Small Swarm of Rats may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
A Small Swarm of Rats may not be placed if there is no free Wound Track on the Small Swarm of Rat's profile card.

feat-memories_of_life.name: Memories of Life
feat-memories_of_life.subject: Personal
feat-memories_of_life.description: This model loses Insignificant until the current activation is complete.

feat-mighty_blow.name: Mighty Blow
feat-mighty_blow.subject: Personal
feat-mighty_blow.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Strong [Melee] for the next Damage Roll.

feat-military_training.name: Military Training
feat-military_training.subject: Special
feat-military_training.description: This model's Controller gains a Pass Token.

feat-mind_control.name: Mind Control
feat-mind_control.subject: Target
feat-mind_control.description:
Until the end of the current activation, if Target other Bakemono must make a Disguise or Fear Test, this model makes the Test instead.
Target model may attempt the Disguise Test as if it had Ki Stat 2 or higher. While making Tests for the Target, this model gains Bravery and loses Cowardly.

feat-mirage.name: Mirage
feat-mirage.subject: Special
feat-mirage.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it entered into BtB with, or Targets this model with a Ranged Attack or Ki Feat, but before any Melee Exchange begins; place this model within 2" of its current location, the Enemy model's action is then considered resolved.

feat-misdirection.name: Misdirection
feat-misdirection.subject: Target
feat-misdirection.description: Target model has no ZoC and models may choose not to be considered in BtB with it when declaring and performing their actions.

feat-mob_mentality.name: Mob Mentality
feat-mob_mentality.subject: Personal
feat-mob_mentality.description:
When a Bakemono model passes a Fear Test, it does not need to re-roll that test due to Cowardly. This Ki Feat may be used after the dice are rolled, as if it were granting a re-roll.
X is equal to the number of times this feat has been used previously this turn.

feat-mocking_blow.name: Mocking Blow
feat-mocking_blow.subject: Personal
feat-mocking_blow.description: When this model next deals Damage as a result of a Melee Exchange, the Opposing model gains an Impetuous Marker.

feat-morph.name: Morph
feat-morph.subject: Special
feat-morph.description: Until this model uses the Ki Feat Morph again this model gains either a Ki Feat, Base Statistic, Statistic Ki Boost, or Trait of an Enemy model in BtB, as if it were printed on its card.

feat-mountain_gale.name: Mountain Gale
feat-mountain_gale.subject: Special
feat-mountain_gale.description: Until the End Phase, whilst this model is in play, models making Ranged Attacks suffer a +2 modifier to the Target Number of Ranged Attack Tests.

feat-mountain_stance.name: Mountain Stance
feat-mountain_stance.subject: Personal
feat-mountain_stance.description: This model gains Immovable until the End Phase.

feat-move_it!.name: Move It!
feat-move_it!.subject: Pulse
feat-move_it!.description: This model's Controller chooses up to 3 other Friendly Ashigaru models within the Pulse's area of effect. Those models immediately perform a Walk up to their Walk stat in inches.

feat-multitudes.name: Multitudes
feat-multitudes.subject: Personal
feat-multitudes.description:
Until the End Phase, if this model is Killed, replace it by Summoning and Deploying an available non-Unique, non-Rinsho, Horde Bakemono with 1 Wound box unmarked.
Then Summon and Deploy an available non-Unique, non-Rinsho, Horde Bakemono in BtB with that model with 1 Wound box unmarked.

feat-mutation.name: Mutation
feat-mutation.subject: Personal
feat-mutation.description:
This model gains one of the following until the End Phase:
• +1 Melee Weapon Strength
• Regenerate (2)
• Armour (+1)

feat-nerve_strike.name: Nerve Strike
feat-nerve_strike.subject: Personal
feat-nerve_strike.description: Until the end of the current activation, each time this model would make a Damage Roll in a Melee Exchange, instead the Enemy model removes an Activation Counter.

feat-nuki_do.name: Nuki Do
feat-nuki_do.subject: Personal
feat-nuki_do.description: When this model does not have the Initiative, it gains +1 Melee Pool, Dodge (+1), and Defensive until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-obey.name: Obey
feat-obey.subject: Target
feat-obey.description: Target Enemy model gains one Control Marker.

feat-obey_your_master.name: Obey Your Master
feat-obey_your_master.subject: Target
feat-obey_your_master.description: Target model gains a Controlled Marker.

feat-obscured_by_umbra.name: Obscured by Umbra
feat-obscured_by_umbra.subject: Personal
feat-obscured_by_umbra.description: This model gains Intangible until the end of the current action.

feat-ophidian_arrow.name: Ophidian Arrow
feat-ophidian_arrow.subject: Personal
feat-ophidian_arrow.description:
Make a Ranged Attack, ignoring Reload Markers and the Reload Trait.
On a successful attack, choose an Izu Serpent model that is not currently in play.
Before you make the Damage Roll, the Target suffers the following in addition to the Ranged Damage roll:
• Asp: Poison (2) Marker
• Boa Constrictor: Immobilised Marker
• Cobra: Blind Marker
Once the attack is resolved, if the attack was successful, Deploy the chosen Izu Serpent model in BtB with the Target model, ignoring the usual BtB restriction on Deploying a model.

feat-orochis_prayer.name: Orochi's Prayer
feat-orochis_prayer.subject: Pulse
feat-orochis_prayer.description: Models within the Pulse gain a Poison (2) Marker.

feat-orochis_visage.name: Orochi's Visage
feat-orochis_visage.subject: Personal
feat-orochis_visage.description: This model gains Fear (6) and Terror until the end of the current activation.

feat-outmanoeuvre.name: Outmanoeuvre
feat-outmanoeuvre.subject: Personal
feat-outmanoeuvre.description: When applying Melee Assist penalties, this model inflicts -2 dice rather than -1 until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

feat-outwit.name: Outwit
feat-outwit.subject: Target
feat-outwit.description: Controller of Target model that just declared a Scenario Action must choose a different action or may choose another model to activate. That model does not lose an Activation Counter if it does not perform an action.

feat-overrule.name: Overrule
feat-overrule.subject: Target
feat-overrule.description: Target non-Exhausted Enemy model gains an Impetuous Marker.

feat-overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
feat-overwhelm.subject: Personal
feat-overwhelm.description: This model gains Co-ordinated Attack (Kairai) until the End Phase.

feat-pack_alpha.name: Pack Alpha
feat-pack_alpha.subject: Personal
feat-pack_alpha.description: This model gains Order [Monkey](3/6") until the End Phase.

feat-paralyse.name: Paralyse
feat-paralyse.subject: Target
feat-paralyse.description: Target Enemy model becomes Immobilised and gains Slow until the End Phase.

feat-parley.name: Parley
feat-parley.subject: Target
feat-parley.description: Use this Ki Feat when an Enemy model enters BtB with this model. That Enemy model's activation ends immediately.

feat-passing_strike.name: Passing Strike
feat-passing_strike.subject: Personal
feat-passing_strike.description: If this model moved into Melee this Activation, it may make a normal Damage Roll when resolving a successful Sidestep Attack.

feat-pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
feat-pathfinder.subject: Target
feat-pathfinder.description: Target Friendly model gains Lightfooted until the End Phase.

feat-path_of_flowers.name: Path of Flowers
feat-path_of_flowers.subject: Special
feat-path_of_flowers.description:
When this model is Deployed from Flank, you may deploy it in the centre point of the battlefield.
If there is a model, objective, or terrain in the centre of the battlefield, deploy this model in BtB with any model, objective, or terrain of your choice, ignoring the usual Deployment restrictions.

feat-pay_your_dues.name: Pay Your Dues
feat-pay_your_dues.subject: Target
feat-pay_your_dues.description: Target Enemy that is not an Animal must choose to either gain a Death Sentence Marker or transfer 1 of its Ki Tokens to this model.

feat-perfect_defence.name: Perfect Defence
feat-perfect_defence.subject: Personal
feat-perfect_defence.description: This model gains Impenetrable Defence until the end of the current activation.

feat-performance.name: Performance
feat-performance.subject: Personal
feat-performance.description: This model gains Endurance until the End Phase.

feat-pestilence.name: Pestilence
feat-pestilence.subject: Pulse
feat-pestilence.description: All models within 3" gain a Poison (1) Marker and a Spirit Block Marker.

feat-pick_pocket.name: Pick Pocket
feat-pick_pocket.subject: Target
feat-pick_pocket.description: Target Friendly Urchin that is within 2" of an Enemy model. If the Enemy model has an enhancement - equipment card, transfer it to Fai-ginn's card.

feat-pile_on.name: Pile On!
feat-pile_on.subject: Pulse
feat-pile_on.description:
During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Bakemono model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route.
If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.

feat-pin_weapon.name: Pin Weapon
feat-pin_weapon.subject: Personal
feat-pin_weapon.description:
Before the Enemy model chooses a Weapon to use in a Melee Exchange, choose a Weapon they have access to.
For the rest of the current activation, replace that Weapon on the Enemy model's card with:
Unarmed (-2 Melee Strength, no Traits, no Specials).

feat-pinprick.name: Pinprick
feat-pinprick.subject: Special
feat-pinprick.description: When using this model's Blowgun weapon, instead of rolling a Damage Roll, you may choose to inflict 1 Damage ignoring Tough.

feat-practised_manoeuvres.name: Practised Manoeuvres
feat-practised_manoeuvres.subject: Personal
feat-practised_manoeuvres.description: When applying Melee Assist penalties for a Melee Exchange involving Lone Swordsmen, this model inflicts -2 dice rather than -1 until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

feat-prayer_of_healing.name: Prayer of Healing
feat-prayer_of_healing.subject: Aura
feat-prayer_of_healing.description: This model may Target any model within the Aura with its Heal trait.

feat-prayer_of_purification.name: Prayer of Purification
feat-prayer_of_purification.subject: Personal
feat-prayer_of_purification.description: When this model uses its Heal trait, instead of Healing Wounds it may instead remove an equal number of Berserk, Blind, Controlled, Fire, Poison, Spirit Block, or Stunned Markers from the Target.

feat-prayer_of_undeath.name: Prayer of Undeath
feat-prayer_of_undeath.subject: Pulse
feat-prayer_of_undeath.description: Target Kairai receives a bonus of X to the final result of its next Rise Test this turn where X is the number of Ki Tokens spent; this may not be greater than 2.

feat-precision.name: Precision
feat-precision.subject: Personal
feat-precision.description: This model's Weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-precision_shot.name: Precision Shot
feat-precision_shot.subject: Personal
feat-precision_shot.description: This model's Ranged Weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-precision_strike.name: Precision Strike
feat-precision_strike.subject: Personal
feat-precision_strike.description: This model's weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-prediction.name: Prediction
feat-prediction.subject: Special
feat-prediction.description: This model's Controller's Opponent must declare which model they will choose as their next Activating model. If the model becomes ineligible before it is chosen as the Activating model then another model can be chosen without restriction.

feat-proficiency.name: Proficiency
feat-proficiency.subject: Personal
feat-proficiency.description: This model gains Feint (1) and Dodge (1) until the end of the activation.

feat-promo.name: Promo
feat-promo.subject: Target
feat-promo.description: Whenever Target model makes a Fear Test against a Buto model, the Buto gains Terror.

feat-provoke.name: Provoke
feat-provoke.subject: Target
feat-provoke.description: Target Enemy model gains an Impetuous Marker, the Opposing Player may not declare use of a Pass Token next activation.

feat-psychic_drain.name: Psychic Drain
feat-psychic_drain.subject: Target
feat-psychic_drain.description: Transfer up to 3 Ki Tokens from the Target Enemy model's profile card to this card.

feat-psychic_venom.name: Psychic Venom
feat-psychic_venom.subject: Target
feat-psychic_venom.description: Target Enemy model gains X Poison (2) Markers. X may not be greater than 3.

feat-pulling_the_strings.name: Pulling the Strings
feat-pulling_the_strings.subject: Target
feat-pulling_the_strings.description: You may Walk Target Enemy model 2".

feat-quagmire.name: Quagmire
feat-quagmire.subject: Aura
feat-quagmire.description: The Aura's area is considered [Difficult, Clear, Zero] terrain.

feat-quick_march.name: Quick March
feat-quick_march.subject: Aura
feat-quick_march.description: All Friendly Ashigaru within the Aura ignore the Melee Penalty for having Run.

feat-quick_reload.name: Quick Reload
feat-quick_reload.subject: Personal
feat-quick_reload.description: Remove any Reload Markers from this model.

feat-rage.name: Rage
feat-rage.subject: Personal
feat-rage.description:
Use this Ki Feat during the Starting Phase.
This model gains a Berserk Marker and gains Strong until the End Phase.

feat-rage_against_time.name: Rage Against Time
feat-rage_against_time.subject: Pulse
feat-rage_against_time.description:
Non-Soulless, Non-Satsui models in the Pulse gain a Berserk Marker.
X=Current Turn Number.

feat-raijins_rage.name: Raijin's Rage
feat-raijins_rage.subject: Special
feat-raijins_rage.description:
When this model makes a successful Ranged Attack, after that Attack is resolved but before its activation ends it may make an additional Ranged Attack against another model within 3" of the last model Targeted.
This Ranged Attack is considered to be in the Medium Range Band and ignores Range, LoS, and Camouflage.

feat-rain_of_blows.name: Rain of Blows
feat-rain_of_blows.subject: Personal
feat-rain_of_blows.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Combo Attack (0) and Lightning Reflexes until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-rally.name: Rally
feat-rally.subject: Pulse
feat-rally.description: Remove the Frightened state from all Friendly models in the Pulse.

feat-rampage.name: Rampage
feat-rampage.subject: Personal
feat-rampage.description: This model gains Agile and Indomitable (1) until the End Phase.

feat-rangefinder.name: Rangefinder
feat-rangefinder.subject: Special
feat-rangefinder.description: Deploy a Signal Flag in BtB with this model if one is available.

feat-rankiryu.name: Rankiryu
feat-rankiryu.subject: Pulse
feat-rankiryu.description: Models in the Pulse that have been Placed this activation gain a Spirit Block Marker.

feat-reanimate.name: Reanimate
feat-reanimate.subject: Personal
feat-reanimate.description: This model may re-roll a failed Rise Test.

feat-rectifying_shōmyō.name: Rectifying Shōmyō
feat-rectifying_shōmyō.subject: Aura
feat-rectifying_shōmyō.description: When a Friendly model causes a Kami to be removed from play in a Melee Exchange while in the Aura, you may replace the Kami by Summoning and Deploying a Friendly, 8 Rice Cost, Kami with identical Elemental Icons (if the Enemy Kami has no Elemental Icons, you may replace it with a Lesser Void Kami).

feat-reel_them_in!.name: Reel Them In!
feat-reel_them_in!.subject: Pulse
feat-reel_them_in!.description: When a Friendly model in the Pulse Damages an Enemy model with a Harpoon Ranged Attack, the Enemy model becomes Prone.

feat-reflexes.name: Reflexes
feat-reflexes.subject: Personal
feat-reflexes.description: Move this model directly away from an Enemy model in BtB until it leaves its ZoC. After moving, this model must use Bodyguard. If it cannot, it doesn't Move.

feat-regrowth.name: Regrowth
feat-regrowth.subject: Personal
feat-regrowth.description: This model gains Regenerate (2) until the End Phase.

feat-reiji_kinoko.name: Reiji Kinoko
feat-reiji_kinoko.subject: Personal
feat-reiji_kinoko.description:
Replace this model with the Zoo model.
Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Zoo's profile card has the same number of Wounds marked as Xi-Han.
Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any Tokens to Zoo's profile card, Zoo gains an Impetuous Marker.
When this effect expires in the End Phase, replace Zoo with Xi-Han.
Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Xi-Han's profile has the same number of Wounds marked as Zoo.
Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any tokens to Xi-Han's profile card.

feat-rend.name: Rend
feat-rend.subject: Personal
feat-rend.description:
This model gains Brutal (+1) until the current action is resolved.
This model may only use this Feat once per Melee Exchange.

feat-rend_soul.name: Rend Soul
feat-rend_soul.subject: Personal
feat-rend_soul.description: This model gains a Melee Strength bonus equal to X for the next Damage Roll this turn, where X is the number of Ki Tokens spent; this may not be greater than 3. This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-reputation.name: Reputation
feat-reputation.subject: Target
feat-reputation.description:
During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Stunned Marker.
This Ki Feat may only be used once per model in any activation.

feat-requiem.name: Requiem
feat-requiem.subject: Aura
feat-requiem.description:
Kairai models cannot be Deployed in the Aura.
Models in the Aura cannot be Replaced with Kairai models.

feat-resolve_of_rock.name: Resolve of Rock
feat-resolve_of_rock.subject: Personal
feat-resolve_of_rock.description: This model gains Tireless and Construct until the End Phase.

feat-restitution.name: Restitution
feat-restitution.subject: Target
feat-restitution.description: Until the End Phase, Target Friendly model with a Control Marker gains +1 to its Melee Pool and Ranged Pool while it has a Control Marker.

feat-retract.name: Retract
feat-retract.subject: Personal
feat-retract.description: This model becomes Prone or if Prone, this model loses the Prone State

feat-rivalry.name: Rivalry
feat-rivalry.subject: Target
feat-rivalry.description: Target other Friendly Faction model with Rice Cost equal to this model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase

feat-sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
feat-sacrifice.subject: Target
feat-sacrifice.description:
Remove Target Friendly, non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model that you own from play.
If you do, add 4 Ki Tokens to the Yuta of Yurei card.

feat-saihai.name: Saihai
feat-saihai.subject: Pulse
feat-saihai.description: Any Friendly Blood Brother models in the Pulse (including this model) may immediately perform a Walk up to their Walk Statistic in inches.

feat-salvation.name: Salvation
feat-salvation.subject: Aura
feat-salvation.description: Oher models in the aura cannot be Killed. If a model in the Aura would have its final Wound Box marked, instead leave one box unmarked.

feat-sames_warning.name: Same's Warning
feat-sames_warning.subject: Target
feat-sames_warning.description: Target model gains Sixth Sense until the End Phase

feat-savage_beating.name: Savage Beating
feat-savage_beating.subject: Personal
feat-savage_beating.description: This model gains Combo Attack (0) until the current action is resolved.

feat-scorch_the_earth.name: Scorch the Earth
feat-scorch_the_earth.subject: Special BtB
feat-scorch_the_earth.description:
Place the Scorched Earth template in BtB with this model.
It is a Terrain element [Difficult, Obscuring, Zero].
Models contacting this Terrain gain a Fire (3) Marker.
Remove the Terrain element in the End Phase.
Add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

feat-second_wind.name: Second Wind
feat-second_wind.subject: Personal
feat-second_wind.description:
At the end of an activation in which this model declared a Charge action and caused Wounds in a Melee Exchange it gains an Activation Counter.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-seduction.name: Seduction
feat-seduction.subject: Target
feat-seduction.description: If this model is successful the Targeted model gains Stupid until the End Phase.

feat-seed_of_destruction.name: Seed of Destruction
feat-seed_of_destruction.subject: Target
feat-seed_of_destruction.description:
Place 2 Seed Counters on Target Enemy model.
Remove a Seed Counter each time the model activates, when the last Seed Counter is removed centre a 2" Pulse on the Target, deal 8 Damage split evenly (rounded down) between Enemy models in the Pulse.
This model may not use this Ki Feat while any Enemy model has Seed Counters.

feat-set_the_scene.name: Set the Scene
feat-set_the_scene.subject: Special
feat-set_the_scene.description: Place a piece of [Impassable, Blocking, Large], [Destructible] terrain that fits on a 50mm base onto the Battlefield. Remove it in the End Phase.

feat-shadow.name: Shadow
feat-shadow.subject: Pulse
