feat-shadow.description: During an Enemy model's activation when it begins a movement in the Pulse, once the movement is completed this model may Walk up to its Move towards that model's final position.

feat-shadow_arts.name: Shadow Arts
feat-shadow_arts.subject: Personal
feat-shadow_arts.description: This model gains Lightfooted and Assassin until the end of the current activation.

feat-shadow_crows.name: Shadow Crows
feat-shadow_crows.subject: Special
feat-shadow_crows.description: Place the Conjured Shadow Crows template in BtB with this model.

feat-shadow_rats.name: Shadow Rats
feat-shadow_rats.subject: Pulse
feat-shadow_rats.description: Exchange positions of this model with any Friendly Rat model in the pulse.

feat-shadow_tendrils.name: Shadow Tendrils
feat-shadow_tendrils.subject: Target
feat-shadow_tendrils.description: Target Enemy model suffers -3 Walk until the End Phase.

feat-shadow_walk.name: Shadow Walk
feat-shadow_walk.subject: Personal
feat-shadow_walk.description:
If this model is out of LoS of all enemy models, place it within 3" of its current location.
This feat can only be used once per activation.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-shared_reflexes.name: Shared Reflexes
feat-shared_reflexes.subject: Special
feat-shared_reflexes.description: This model and Friendly Spectre models gain Brutal (1) and Parry (1) until the end of the Melee Exchange.

feat-shared_senses.name: Shared Senses
feat-shared_senses.subject: Special
feat-shared_senses.description: This model and Friendly Spectre models gain Aware and Ranged Defence (2) until the end of the current activation.

feat-shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
feat-shapeshift.subject: Special
feat-shapeshift.description: Replace this model with its other form (Fox Form / Human Form). Transfer marked Wounds, State Markers, Enhancement, and any Tokens to the other model.

feat-shiatsu.name: Shiatsu
feat-shiatsu.subject: Target
feat-shiatsu.description: Remove one Berserk, Control, Frightened, Impetuous, Spirit Block or Stunned Marker from Target Non-Animal model.

feat-shrine_desecration.name: Shrine Desecration
feat-shrine_desecration.subject: Personal
feat-shrine_desecration.description:
Deploy a Desecrated Shrine in BtB with this model. It is a 30mm base, Clear - Normal, Destructible terrain piece with Believer [Shugenja](1/3") and Disturb Flow (1/6").
Remove the shrine if another is created or if Yugio is removed from play.

feat-shroud.name: Shroud
feat-shroud.subject: Aura
feat-shroud.description:
Enemy models that are not in the Aura cannot draw LoS to models completely inside the Aura.
Models completely in the Aura do not block Enemy model's LoS.

feat-sick_em!.name: Sick Em!
feat-sick_em!.subject: Special
feat-sick_em!.description: When Friendly Animal models Target or participate in a Melee Exchange with chosen Enemy model, they gain Bravery and Co-ordinated Attack [Friendly] until the End Phase.

feat-sidewinder.name: Sidewinder
feat-sidewinder.subject: Target
feat-sidewinder.description:
Before a Melee Exchange, this model swaps positions with the Enemy model.
Both models must remain in BtB.
If either model cannot fit in the space available, this Ki Feat cannot be used.

feat-signal.name: Signal
feat-signal.subject: Pulse
feat-signal.description: When you become the Active Player, before choosing to activate, choose any number of Friendly Kabuki models in the Pulse to activate in the same single activation. Each model resolves any movement before any Melee Exchanges are resolved. Melee Exchanges are then resolved in the order the Controlling player chooses.

feat-silence_of_the_void.name: Silence of the Void
feat-silence_of_the_void.subject: Personal
feat-silence_of_the_void.description:
Use only in the Main Phase.
Add 2 to this model's statistics until the End Phase. This is considered a Ki Boost.
This Warband may use this Ki Feat only once per turn.

feat-simian_trickery.name: Simian Trickery
feat-simian_trickery.subject: Personal
feat-simian_trickery.description:
If Niseru is within 6" of this model choose:
• Place Niseru in BtB with this model. If this model is in BtB with an Enemy model, Niseru must also be placed in Bt with at least 1 Enemy model.
• Place this model in BtB with Niseru. If Niseru is in BtB with an Enemy model, this model must also be placed in BtB with at least 1 Enemy model.

feat-sisterly_bond.name: Sisterly Bond
feat-sisterly_bond.subject: Pulse
feat-sisterly_bond.description: Immediately Heal all Friendly Princesses in the Pulse to have the same number of marked Wound boxes as the least Wounded Friendly Princess model.

feat-sisters_succour.name: Sister's Succour
feat-sisters_succour.subject: Pulse
feat-sisters_succour.description:
During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Princess model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route.
If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.

feat-skewer.name: Skewer
feat-skewer.subject: Personal
feat-skewer.description: When an Enemy model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange with this model, it may not move except to change facing until the End Phase.

feat-slice.name: Slice
feat-slice.subject: Personal
feat-slice.description: Until the end of this activation, this model's Kama weapon gains Bleed (1/3) while in a Melee Exchange with a Surprised Enemy model.

feat-slipstream.name: Slipstream
feat-slipstream.subject: Personal
feat-slipstream.description:
When this model Runs this activation, it may Move through other Friendly models.
It may not end its Move occupying the same area as an Impassable Terrain Element or another model.
Any model moved through can Move 1”.

feat-slither.name: Slither
feat-slither.subject: Personal
feat-slither.description: This model gains Agile and Evasive until the current action is resolved.

feat-smash_your_dreams.name: Smash Your Dreams
feat-smash_your_dreams.subject: Target
feat-smash_your_dreams.description: Target model cannot benefit from the Brutal, Dodge, Feint, Kata, Lightning Reflexes, Parry, Prowess, or Reach traits until the end of the current activation.

feat-smite.name: Smite
feat-smite.subject: Personal
feat-smite.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Slam Attack (0) until the current activation is resolved.

feat-snap_shot.name: Snap Shot
feat-snap_shot.subject: Personal
feat-snap_shot.description: This model immediately makes a Ranged Attack ignoring Reload markers on this model.

feat-snare.name: Snare
feat-snare.subject: Pulse
feat-snare.description:
When an Enemy model without Cloudwalk or Intangible, and not in BtB with a Friendly model, declares a Walk in the Pulse, that model must make a Walk Challenge Test (X).
X is 8 for models declaring a Run or Charge Action. X is 7 otherwise.
If it fails the model may not Walk; if it was declaring an action, it loses an Activation Counter and its action is considered resolved.
This is a Trap effect.

feat-sneak.name: Sneak
feat-sneak.subject: Personal
feat-sneak.description: This model gains Evasive and Lightfooted until the End Phase.

feat-sojutsu.name: Sojutsu
feat-sojutsu.subject: Target
feat-sojutsu.description: Target Friendly Ashigaru gains Co-ordinated Attack [Ashigaru] until the current action is resolved.

feat-soothing_shomyo.name: Soothing Shomyo
feat-soothing_shomyo.subject: Aura
feat-soothing_shomyo.description:
Models in the Aura gain Immune [Berserk].
When rolling a Damage Roll against a Friendly model within the Aura, after the result is determined, roll an additional dice and then choose 1 dice to remove, use the remaining 2 dice for the Damage Roll.

feat-soul_fire.name: Soul Fire
feat-soul_fire.subject: Target
feat-soul_fire.description: Target Enemy model gains a number of Fire (1) Markers equal to the Success Level of the Test +1 and a Spirit Block Marker.

feat-soul_thirst.name: Soul Thirst
feat-soul_thirst.subject: Pulse
feat-soul_thirst.description: When an Enemy model is Killed within the Pulse, this model may Heal a number of Wounds and gain a number of Ki Tokens equal to the removed model's Ki Statistic.

feat-sound_the_advance!.name: Sound the Advance!
feat-sound_the_advance!.subject: Pulse
feat-sound_the_advance!.description: Friendly Loyal models in the Pulse gain Fear (6) until the End Phase.

feat-specialist_knowledge.name: Specialist Knowledge
feat-specialist_knowledge.subject: Personal
feat-specialist_knowledge.description: A Friendly Samurai or Ashigaru model in BtB gains the Weighted Tetsubo Enhancement card if permitted.

feat-spin.name: Spin
feat-spin.subject: Personal
feat-spin.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become 4/6/8 and this model gains Strong [Ranged] until the current Activation is complete.

feat-spirit_absolution.name: Spirit Absolution
feat-spirit_absolution.subject: Target
feat-spirit_absolution.description:
This model loses Soulless, Slow, Tough, and Rise. This effect expires in the End Phase.
Target model not in BtB with a Friendly model gains an Impetuous Marker, must declare a Walk action as its next activation, and must move directly towards this model with its full Walk Statistic, changing facing so that this model is in LoS. If unable to perform a Walk action, it may activate without restriction.

feat-spirit_guardian.name: Spirit Guardian
feat-spirit_guardian.subject: Pulse
feat-spirit_guardian.description: When a Friendly model within the Pulse's area of effect is Targeted by an Enemy model's Ki Feat, change the Target to this model. Range is measured to the original Target.

feat-spirit_ward.name: Spirit Ward
feat-spirit_ward.subject: Aura
feat-spirit_ward.description: While within this Aura, Kami and Asura models cannot move closer to this model.

feat-spiritual_conduit.name: Spiritual Conduit
feat-spiritual_conduit.subject: Aura
feat-spiritual_conduit.description: Friendly Ito Shisai models within the Aura can use this model as the point of origin for Targeted Ki Feats when this model is not in BtB with or within an Enemy model's ZoC.Use this model to draw LoS and Range for the feat.

feat-spotlight.name: Spotlight
feat-spotlight.subject: Special
feat-spotlight.description: You may centre a 2" Aura on a Friendly Lantern. Kabuki models in the Aura gain Kata. Kabuki models outside the Aura gain Insignificant while the Aura is on the Battlefield. If this Ki Feat is used again, by any model, the Aura on the previous Lantern expires.

feat-spur_on.name: Spur On
feat-spur_on.subject: Target
feat-spur_on.description: Until the End Phase Target Friendly Animal model gains Rise (4) and loses the Aloof trait.

feat-stagger.name: Stagger
feat-stagger.subject: Personal
feat-stagger.description: This model gains Ranged Defence (1) and Sidestep Defence (0) until the end of the current activation.

feat-stand_behind_me!.name: Stand Behind Me!
feat-stand_behind_me!.subject: Personal
feat-stand_behind_me!.description: This model grants Cover as if it were terrain until the end of the current activation.

feat-steal_vitality.name: Steal Vitality
feat-steal_vitality.subject: Target
feat-steal_vitality.description:
Target Enemy model loses an Activation Counter.
Choose a Friendly model within 6, that model gains an Activation Counter.

feat-stir_emotion.name: Stir Emotion
feat-stir_emotion.subject: Target
feat-stir_emotion.description:
Target gains a number of the following Markers equal to the Success Level of the Opposed Test in the order given, up to one of each:
Stunned, Impetuous, Frightened, Berserk.

feat-stolen_glory.name: Stolen Glory
feat-stolen_glory.subject: Pulse
feat-stolen_glory.description:
When a Friendly Onisho model deals damage in a Melee Exchange in the Pulse, if this model is not in BtB or an Enemy model's ZoC, once the Melee Exchange is resolved this model may immediately Charge the Enemy model.
Neither model loses Activation Counters for this Charge or for participating in the Melee Exchange.
If the Enemy model is removed from play only this model may use the Consume Soul Ki Feat this activation.

feat-storm_manipulation.name: Storm Manipulation
feat-storm_manipulation.subject: Personal
feat-storm_manipulation.description:
When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose one of the following until the Ranged Attack Action is resolved:
• This model's Ranged Weapon's range bands become 4/8/12• This model's Ranged Weapon gains Strength (+1)• This model's Ranged Weapon gains Slam Attack (0)

feat-storm_path.name: Storm Path
feat-storm_path.subject: Personal
feat-storm_path.description:
When this model Runs or Charges this activation, any model moved through gains a Stunned Marker and a Fire (1) Marker.
During this movement, this model may move through Destructible terrain. If it does, remove the terrain from the battlefield.

feat-strafe.name: Strafe
feat-strafe.subject: Personal
feat-strafe.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (2) until the until the current action is resolved.

feat-strangulation.name: Strangulation
feat-strangulation.subject: Personal
feat-strangulation.description: This model's Garrotte Weapon gains Critical Attack (0) and Powerful Attack (0).

feat-strip_soul.name: Strip Soul
feat-strip_soul.subject: Target
feat-strip_soul.description: Target Enemy model gains one Spirit Block Marker and Insignificant until the End Phase.X is equal to the Ki Statistic of the Targeted Enemy model.

feat-stronger_than_hate.name: Stronger Than Hate
feat-stronger_than_hate.subject: Personal
feat-stronger_than_hate.description: Until the end of the current activation, each time this model deals Damage in a Melee Exchange, the Enemy non-Satsui model loses an Activation Counter.

feat-stubbornness_of_steel.name: Stubbornness of Steel
feat-stubbornness_of_steel.subject: Personal
feat-stubbornness_of_steel.description: This model gains Rise (3) until the End Phase.

feat-subtle_dominance.name: Subtle Dominance
feat-subtle_dominance.subject: Target
feat-subtle_dominance.description: When Target model declares an action it must make a Ki Challenge Test (5), if it fails its activation ends and it loses an Activation Counter.

feat-summon_from_the_shadows.name: Summon from the Shadows
feat-summon_from_the_shadows.subject: Special
feat-summon_from_the_shadows.description:
Deploy a Horde Bakemono anywhere within 2" of this model.
If there are no Bakemono cards available with a free wound track this feat cannot be used.
This Warband may use this Ki Feat only once per turn.

feat-summon_ice_kami.name: Summon Ice Kami
feat-summon_ice_kami.subject: Personal
feat-summon_ice_kami.description:
Summon a Ronin Kami of Reflection by Replacing this model (this model is removed from play).
(You cannot have more models in play than the card has Wound Tracks).
If this model was in a Melee Exchange, the Kami can neither be damaged nor deal damage this exchange.

feat-supplies.name: Supplies
feat-supplies.subject: Pulse
feat-supplies.description: Remove a Reload Marker from, or and an Ammo Token to, a model in the Pulse.

feat-surge.name: Surge
feat-surge.subject: Special
feat-surge.description: Call Lightning Ranged Attacks gain +1 Strength and Slam Attack (0) until the current activation is complete.

feat-suri-ashi.name: Suri-Ashi
feat-suri-ashi.subject: Personal
feat-suri-ashi.description: After a Melee Exchange is complete, this model may move away from the Enemy model until it leaves its ZoC, at which point its movement ends.

feat-swallow_whole.name: Swallow Whole
feat-swallow_whole.subject: Personal
feat-swallow_whole.description:
This feat must be declared before Initiative is determined in a Melee Exchange. If this model's Attack is successful, place the Enemy model Elsewhere.
Affected Enemy models suffer one Wound (ignoring Tough) if they are Elsewhere in the End Phase. For each Wound taken, this model gains 1 Ki Token.
When this model is removed from play for any reason, first place any affected models in BtB with this model. If this model is not on the Battlefield when it is removed from play, affected models gain Flank and return to play using that rule.

feat-sweep.name: Sweep
feat-sweep.subject: Personal
feat-sweep.description: This model gains Sweep Attack (0) until the end of the current activation.

feat-swift_executor.name: Swift Executor
feat-swift_executor.subject: Personal
feat-swift_executor.description:
This model loses Insignificant until the end of this activation.
If this model declares a Wait or Scenario Action, it may Walk a distance equal to its Move Statistic before or after the Action.

feat-sworn_sisters.name: Sworn Sisters
feat-sworn_sisters.subject: Target
feat-sworn_sisters.description: Target other Friendly Princess model gains an Activation Marker.

feat-tactical_counsel.name: Tactical Counsel
feat-tactical_counsel.subject: Special
feat-tactical_counsel.description: This model's Controller can re-roll the Tactical Roll at the start of any turn.

feat-tactical_master.name: Tactical Master
feat-tactical_master.subject: Personal
feat-tactical_master.description: This model gains Command [Friendly](X/8") until the End Phase.

feat-tail_whip.name: Tail Whip
feat-tail_whip.subject: Target
feat-tail_whip.description:
During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model or a Friendly Faction Shisai model in BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Stunned Marker.
A model may only gain one Stunned Marker per activation as a result of this Ki Feat.

feat-takashi_koryu.name: Takashi Koryu
feat-takashi_koryu.subject: Personal
feat-takashi_koryu.description: This model gains Critical Attack (1) until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

feat-taunt.name: Taunt
feat-taunt.subject: Target
feat-taunt.description: Target Enemy model gains Aggressive until the End Phase.

feat-tax.name: Tax
feat-tax.subject: Aura
feat-tax.description: When an Enemy model within the Aura's area of effect uses a Ki Feat or Ki Boost, the cost in Ki Tokens is increased by 1, and this model gains 1 Ki Token.

feat-temporal_barrier.name: Temporal Barrier
feat-temporal_barrier.subject: Aura
feat-temporal_barrier.description: While within the Aura, models gain Ranged Defence (2).

feat-ten-uchi.name: Ten-Uchi
feat-ten-uchi.subject: Personal
feat-ten-uchi.description: This model's weapons gain Unblockable (1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-tenacious.name: Tenacious
feat-tenacious.subject: Personal
feat-tenacious.description: This model gains Tough (+1) until the End Phase.

feat-territorial.name: Territorial
feat-territorial.subject: Target
feat-territorial.description: Target Enemy that is not an Animal model that is in BtB with a Scenario Objective or in a Scenario Zone, must choose to either lose an Activation Counter or transfer 1 of Its Ki Tokens to this model.

feat-thanatophobia.name: Thanatophobia
feat-thanatophobia.subject: Pulse
feat-thanatophobia.description:
Frightened models in the Pulse take a Success Level 2 Damage Roll.
X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on this model after paying for this Ki Feat.

feat-the_void_stares_back.name: The Void Stares Back
feat-the_void_stares_back.subject: Target
feat-the_void_stares_back.description:
Target non-Satsui Enemy model which has LoS to this model.
Make a Success Level 4 Damage Roll on the Target model.
Wounds caused by this Ki Feat ignore Armour.
A model can only be targeted by this feat (from any source) once per turn.
The Range of this feat may be measured from a Void Rift.
If this feat causes any Wounds, add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

feat-thrash.name: Thrash
feat-thrash.subject: Personal
feat-thrash.description: Models in a Melee Exchange with this model lose the Dodge trait until the current action is resolved.

feat-threat.name: Threat
feat-threat.subject: Aura
feat-threat.description:
Enemy models ending a move in the Aura or Placed into the Aura must turn to directly face this model.
This Model loses Camouflage while using this Ki Feat.

feat-three_shots_per_minute.name: Three Shots Per Minute
feat-three_shots_per_minute.subject: Personal
feat-three_shots_per_minute.description: This model removes all Reload Markers.

feat-thresher.name: Thresher
feat-thresher.subject: Personal
feat-thresher.description: This model gains Indomitable (1) and Split Attack until the current action is resolved.

feat-tidal_flow.name: Tidal Flow
feat-tidal_flow.subject: Personal
feat-tidal_flow.description:
Use this Ki Feat at the start of any Activation, Move this model up to 4/” towards an Enemy table edge (Any edge which touches an enemy deployment zone).
At the end of this Activation, Move this model 4/” towards the opposite table edge.
This Ki Feat may only be used once per activation.

feat-tide_master.name: Tide Master
feat-tide_master.subject: Personal
feat-tide_master.description: This model gains one of the following until the current Ranged Attack is resolved: *Ranged Weapon Bands become 4/8/12*When making a Ranged Attack this model does not need LoS and ignores Cover*This model's RTanged Weapon gains Sweep Attack (0).

feat-tiger_strike.name: Tiger Strike
feat-tiger_strike.subject: Personal
feat-tiger_strike.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Bleed (1/1) and Sharp (1) until the current activation is complete.

feat-time_reversal.name: Time Reversal
feat-time_reversal.subject: Special
feat-time_reversal.description: All other models gain up to 2 Activation Counters to a maximum of 2.

feat-time_skip.name: Time Skip
feat-time_skip.subject: Special
feat-time_skip.description: Remove all Activation Counters from the board.

feat-time_spiral.name: Time Spiral
feat-time_spiral.subject: Personal
feat-time_spiral.description: This model gains Cloudwalk, Sweep Attack (0), and Unblockable (1) until the end of the current action.

feat-time_splice.name: Time Splice
feat-time_splice.subject: Personal
feat-time_splice.description:
When this model successfully Damages an Opponent in a Melee Exchange, after the Melee Exchange is resolved, Place this model anywhere within 1" of the Enemy model and not in its LoS or within a Spirit Ward Aura (If this is not possible this feat cannot be used).
If this model has a remaining Activation Counter after this activation is completed, you may become the Active Player again and begin this model's activation.

feat-times_favour.name: Time's Favour
feat-times_favour.subject: Pulse
feat-times_favour.description: Enemy models in the Pulse gain Slow until the current action is resolved.

feat-to_the_front!.name: To the Front!
feat-to_the_front!.subject: Aura
feat-to_the_front!.description: Friendly Bushi models in the Aura do not suffer the Melee Penalty for having Run.

feat-tornado.name: Tornado
feat-tornado.subject: Personal
feat-tornado.description:
When a Friendly model within 2" is the Target of a failed Ranged Attack, immediately make a Ranged Attack.
The Range Bands, Strength bonus and any applicable traits or unique effects on the model which failed the Ranged Attack are used instead of any such traits or effects on this model.
This model ignores the effects of Ammo and Reload traits while resolving this Ki Feat.

feat-total_loyalty.name: Total Loyalty
feat-total_loyalty.subject: Personal
feat-total_loyalty.description: This model gains Bodyguard [Samurai, Shisai](2") until the End Phase.

feat-touch_the_silence.name: Touch the Silence
feat-touch_the_silence.subject: Special
feat-touch_the_silence.description:
When this model is successfully attacked in a Melee Exchange, prevent X Wounds.
For each Wound prevented the model making the attack suffers 1 Wound, ignoring Tough.

feat-touch_the_void.name: Touch the Void
feat-touch_the_void.subject: Special
feat-touch_the_void.description:
When this model is successfully attacked in a Melee Exchange, before the Damage Roll spend X Ki Tokens. X may not be greater than 3.
For each Ki Token spent, prevent one Wound.
For each Wound prevented the model making the attack suffers one Wound, ignoring Tough.

feat-trade.name: Trade
feat-trade.subject: Personal
feat-trade.description: This model gains Channel (10/8") and Leech (10/8") until the End Phase.

feat-tsukkakaru.name: Tsukkakaru
feat-tsukkakaru.subject: Personal
feat-tsukkakaru.description: This model gains Banzai! until the current action is resolved.

feat-tsunami.name: Tsunami
feat-tsunami.subject: Pulse
feat-tsunami.description:
Enemy models in the Pulse must pass a Size Challenge Test (7), or be moved directly away from this Riku until they hit an Impassable terrain feature, a model which passes its Size Challenge Test or until they have moved 8".
If another model is contacted by models being moved by this feat, it must make a Size Challenge (6) Test or be pushed along with the original model.

feat-twisting_your_mind.name: Twisting Your Mind
feat-twisting_your_mind.subject: Special
feat-twisting_your_mind.description: This model and Friendly Ningyo gain Regenerate (1) until the End Phase.

feat-umbrella_block.name: Umbrella Block
feat-umbrella_block.subject: Personal
feat-umbrella_block.description: This model gains Parry (1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange

feat-unassailable.name: Unassailable
feat-unassailable.subject: Personal
feat-unassailable.description: This model gains Indomitable (+2) until the End Phase.

feat-uncloak.name: Uncloak
feat-uncloak.subject: Personal
feat-uncloak.description:
Use this feat in the Starting Phase or when this model is targeted by an enemy effect or a model declares an action or resolves an effect that will bring it into BtB with this model while this model is undamaged.

Replace this model with a Loyal Samurai you own that is currently Elsewhere, and place this model Elsewhere.
This model gains the Flank trait and returns to play using those rules.
If the Enemy Model initiated a Melee Exchange, it is now Surprised.
Transfer State Markers, Activation Counters and any tokens to the Samurai's profile card.

feat-unholy_vitality.name: Unholy Vitality
feat-unholy_vitality.subject: Target
feat-unholy_vitality.description:
Target model takes half its remaining Wounds, ignoring Durable (Rounded down) then gains a Activation Counter.
lf used on an Enemy model you must succeed in an opposed Ki Test.

feat-unify.name: Unify
feat-unify.subject: Target
feat-unify.description: Target Friendly model gains Co-ordinated Attack [Friendly] until the End Phase.

feat-unleash_envy.name: Unleash Envy
feat-unleash_envy.subject: Special
feat-unleash_envy.description:
Summon and Deploy an Envy within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Envy's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Envy in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Envy in play.

feat-unleash_gluttony.name: Unleash Gluttony
feat-unleash_gluttony.subject: Special
feat-unleash_gluttony.description:
Summon and Deploy a Gluttony within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Gluttony's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Gluttony in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Gluttony in play.

feat-unleash_sloth.name: Unleash Sloth
feat-unleash_sloth.subject: Special
feat-unleash_sloth.description:
Summon and Deploy a Sloth within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Sloth's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Sloth in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Sloth in play.

feat-unleash_wrath.name: Unleash Wrath
feat-unleash_wrath.subject: Special
feat-unleash_wrath.description:
Summon and Deploy a Wrath within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Wrath's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Wrath in play in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Wrath in play.

feat-unseen_anger.name: Unseen Anger
feat-unseen_anger.subject: Personal
feat-unseen_anger.description: This model gains Lightning Reflexes until the current action is resolved.

feat-vault.name: Vault
feat-vault.subject: Personal
feat-vault.description: This model gains Cloudwalk until the End Phase.

feat-veteran.name: Veteran
feat-veteran.subject: Personal
feat-veteran.description: This model does not suffer Melee dice penalties due to States until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

feat-vicious_strike.name: Vicious Strike
feat-vicious_strike.subject: Personal
feat-vicious_strike.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (+1) until the current action is resolved.

feat-vital_strike.name: Vital Strike
feat-vital_strike.subject: Personal
feat-vital_strike.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (2) until the current activation is resolved.

feat-vitality.name: Vitality
feat-vitality.subject: Personal
feat-vitality.description: This model gains an Activation Counter.

feat-vivacity.name: Vivacity
feat-vivacity.subject: Special
feat-vivacity.description: Add an activation counter to This Model's Card.

feat-voice_of_the_wind.name: Voice of the Wind
feat-voice_of_the_wind.subject: Target
feat-voice_of_the_wind.description:
Place Target Model within 1" of its current location.
If the Target model is an Enemy, you must first succeed in an Opposed Ki Test with the Target model.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.

feat-wall_of_water.name: Wall of Water
feat-wall_of_water.subject: Aura
feat-wall_of_water.description: Enemy models treat the Aura as [Difficult, Obscuring, Small] terrain and must pass a Size Challenge Test (6) to enter BtB with this model; if the Test is failed that model may not enter BtB with this model this activation.

feat-war_cry.name: War Cry
feat-war_cry.subject: Personal
feat-war_cry.description: This model gains Fear (6) until the current action is resolved.

feat-warding_shōmyō.name: Warding Shōmyō
feat-warding_shōmyō.subject: Aura
feat-warding_shōmyō.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (1/6") until the End Phase and while within the Aura Enemy models cannot use Special Attacks or Defences.

feat-warning_rattle.name: Warning Rattle
feat-warning_rattle.subject: Target
feat-warning_rattle.description:
During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Frightened Marker.
Remove the Frightened Marker in the End Phase.

feat-wasp_punch.name: Wasp Punch
feat-wasp_punch.subject: Personal
feat-wasp_punch.description: This model gains Strong until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

feat-weight_of_shadows.name: Weight of Shadows
feat-weight_of_shadows.subject: Personal
feat-weight_of_shadows.description: This model gains Strong until the current action is resolved.

feat-whirlwind_kick.name: Whirlwind Kick
feat-whirlwind_kick.subject: Personal
feat-whirlwind_kick.description: This model gains Indomitable (2) and Split Attack until the End Phase. Add 1 additional Attack die to each exchange when using Split Attack until the End Phase.

feat-whispers_of_the_void.name: Whispers of the Void
feat-whispers_of_the_void.subject: Personal
feat-whispers_of_the_void.description:
Use only in the Main Phase.
Add 1 to this model's statistics until the current activation is complete. This is considered a Ki Boost.

feat-will_of_yurei.name: Will of Yurei
feat-will_of_yurei.subject: Personal
feat-will_of_yurei.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (1/2") until the End Phase.

feat-wing_buffet.name: Wing Buffet
feat-wing_buffet.subject: Pulse
feat-wing_buffet.description: All models in the Pulse's area of effect must succeed in a Size Challenge Test (6) or Walk D3" directly away from this model.

feat-yoko-men.name: Yoko-Men
feat-yoko-men.subject: Personal
feat-yoko-men.description: Models involved in a Melee Exchange with this model lose the Dodge trait until the current action is resolved.
